loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Lorna is 38 years old and has one child still in school.

She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Lorna requested a 20,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

She has been in this business for seven years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
Florencia is a single woman, 57 years old with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Florencia has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a 12,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy fish net, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

Florencia has been in this business for four years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish net, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business

loans.name: Sarvi

texts.ru: Сарви 37 лет. Она живет с мужем и детьми. Дочерей 20 и 2 лет. Сыну 16 лет. Сарви шьет женские национальные платья по заказу. Ей дается такой труд нелегко. Потому что она шьет на старой машинке. Ее машинке более 20 лет. Сарви просит ей помочь для покупки новой современной машинке.  На старой машинке Сарви не успевает сшить и старая машинка не выполняет свои функции достаточно хорошо.  А машинка стоит дорога, а у Сарви нет такая сумма денег для приобретения машинки. Благодаря новой машинке она сможет шить быстрее и качественнее. Еще она хочет купить швейные принадлежности для расширения швейной деятельности. Сарви верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Sarvi is 37 years old. She lives with her husband and children. Her daighters are 20 and 2 years old. Her son is 16 years old. Sarvi sews national dresses to order. This work does not come easy because she sews on an old sewing machine. Her machine is over 20 years. Sarvi is asking for help to buy a new, modern sewing machine. Sarvi cannot sew fast on the old machine, and it does not perform its functions well. A new machine is expensive, and Sarvi does not have enough money to buy it. Thanks to a new machine, she would be able to sew faster and with better quality. She also wants to buy sewing accessories to expand her sewing business. Sarvi believes in You and Your support.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine and sewing accessories

loans.name: Boucotte Yamatogne Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de vingt femmes qui exercent le commerce. Elles sont liées solidairement et prennent des prêts qu'elles remboursent à temps. Madame Bintou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est veuve, âgée de 59 ans et mère de dix enfants dont cinq filles. Elle s'active depuis plus de treize ans dans la transformation de patte d'arachide. Elle va acheter avec le prêt sollicité six sac d'arachides. Elle n'est pas la seule à exercer cette activité mais elle a une clientèle potentielle. Les bénéfices vont servir à la prise en charge de sa famille.
texts.en:
This group is composed of twenty businesswomen. They are mutually liable and the loans they take are repaid on time. Bintou, on the right in the photo with her hand raised, is the group's representative.
She is a 59 year old widow and the mother of ten children, five of whom are girls.
For over thirteen years she has processed peanut paste. With this loan she is seeking, she will buy six sacks of peanuts.
She is not alone in doing this activity, however she has a good potential customer base. The profits will be used to cover this family's living expenses.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is a 54-year-old married woman with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Victoria has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 4 years. Victoria requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fish net, bamboo, gasoline for her boat, and other materials for her business.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish net, bamboo, gasoline for her boat, and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Boucotte Yamatogne Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de neuf femmes qui exercent le commerce. Elles sont liées solidairement et prennent des prêts qu'elles remboursent à temps. Madame Binta qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est mariée, âgée de 58 ans et mère de quatre garçons. Elle s'active depuis plusieurs années dans la vente de tissus teintés. Elle va acheter avec le prêt sollicité une cinquantaine de paire de chaussures et des tissus teintés. Elle n'est pas la seule à mener cette activité mais elle a une clientèle qui lui est fidèle. Les bénéfices vont servir à la prise en charge de sa famille.
texts.en:
This group is made up of nine women who all work in retailing. They work well together and repay their loans on time.

Binta (on the right in the photo with her hand raised) is the group representative. She is fifty-eight years old, married and mother to four boys. She has been selling dyed fabric for several years. She plans to buy fifty pairs of shoes and dyed fabric with her loan. She is not the only person selling these products but she has a very loyal clientele.

Binta will use her profits to provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy dyed fabric.

loans.name: Ndeba's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 3 membres fait partie du Banc Villageois qui a été crée le 20 avril 2011. Il est composé de membres du même village qui sont très solidaires et qui  s'activent dans le commerce.
BOUSSO debout à droite de la photo et levant la main gauche est l'emprunteuse vedette. Elle est âgée de 41 ans,  mariée et  mère 9 enfants dont 3 garçons et 6 filles. 
Avec le prêt reçu elle compte acheter 1 bœuf et 2 moutons. Elle  va acheter le bœuf  à 200 000 FCFA l'engraisser et le revendre au bout de 6 mois à 400 000 FCFA. Avec le reste elle achète deux moutons, l'unité à 25 000 FCFA les engraisser et les revendre  à 40 000 FCFA l'unité. 
Les bénéfices récoltés serviront  à acheter des marchandises pour recharger  sa boutique qu'elle tient chez elle.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three members and is part of the 'Banc Villageois' which was created on 20 April 2011. The women live in the same village and support one another in their retail businesses.

Bousso (standing on the right in the photo with her left hand raised) is the group representative. She is forty-one years old, married and mother to nine children (three boys and six girls). Her loan will buy one cow and two sheep. She will pay 200,000 francs CFA for the cow and after six months fattening it up, sell it on for 400,000 francs CFA. She will pay 25,000 francs CFA for each of the sheep and sell them on for 40,000 francs CFA each.

Bousso's profits will be used to restock the shop that she operates from her home.

loans.use: to buy 1 cow and 2 sheep.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rowena is 59 years old and two of her children are currently in school.

Rowena has a food processing business in the Philippines. Rowena requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like milk, cream, sugar, fruits, and other materials for her food production business.

Rowena has been in this business for six years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like milk, cream, sugar, fruits, and other materials for her food production business.

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita is 49 years old and married with seven children.

She is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Clarita is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed, vaccine, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Clarita has been in this business for 10 years and earns additional income from fishing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccine, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru:
Мадина позитивная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и имеет четырех детей. Живёт она в небольшом сельском посёлке. С детства Мадина мечтала стать учительницей, но так сложились обстоятельства, что она не смогла получить высшего образования из-за финансовой недостаточности в семье. Сразу после окончания средней школы Мадину выдали замуж. И так она стала домохозяйкой. Но, даже находясь постоянно  дома,  Мадина никогда не сидит без дела. Она вместе с мужем стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы обеспечивать своих детей всем необходимым.
Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Мадина вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Мадина выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Мадина получает хороший доход. Муж Мадины также работает в местной мастерской и  его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Мадина с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Мадина заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en:
Madina is a positive and hardworking woman. She is married and has four children. She lives in a small village. Since her childhood, Madina dreamed of becoming a teacher, but circumstances happened such that she could not obtain a college education due to financial hardships in her family. Right after finishing secondary school, Madina was married off, and she became a homemaker, but even always being at home, Madina keeps herself occupied. She and her husband try to do everything possible to provide their children with all of the necessities.

To ensure that they have a consistent income for food, Madina and her husband started their own business. They are involved in animal husbandry. Madina fattens up livestock and then sells meat and milk obtained from the livestock. Madina earns a good income from this business. Madina's husband also works at a local shop, and his work brings in additional income for the family. Their combined income is enough to live at middle class level, and they still do not have enough money to cover all of their needs. At the present time, Madina and her husband want to buy several heads of livestock for fattening up. This is why she comes to Arvand and wants to obtain a loan to buy livestock. Madina thanks Arvand for the support in advance - support that will allow her to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy livestock for fattening up

loans.name: Salimatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupement vient d’entamer son onzième cycle de 6 mois. Il est composé de femmes qui jouissent d’une bonne entente et d’un bon esprit de groupe. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Salimatou, (debout à l’extrême droite avec la main levée) est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 filles. Elle s’active dans la vente de produits locaux.

Avec ce prêt, elle compte acheter 15 sceaux de 15 kg de patte d’arachide à 15000f et payer un transport de 30000 f pour le revendre en détails

 Les bénéfices lui permettront de s’occuper de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group have just agreed their eleventh, six-month-cycle loan. The group is made up of women who get on very well and have a strong group spirit. They all work in retail.

Salimatou (standing on the far right with her hand raised) is the group representative. She is married and has two daughters. She sells local products and will use her loan to buy fifteen buckets (each of fifteen kilos) of peanut paste for 15,000 francs CFA. She will also pay 30,000 francs CFA for transport. Her profits will enable her to provide for her children.

loans.use: to buy 15 x 15kg buckets of peanut paste and pay for transport.

loans.name: Meta's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupement vient d’entamer son onzième cycle et est composé de femmes qui jouissent d’une bonne entente et d’un bon esprit de groupe. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce
.
Madame Méta, (debout à l’extrême droite avec la main levée),  est l’emprunteuse vedette du  groupe. Elle est veuve et mère de 01 fille. Elle s’active dans le commerce d’huile de palme.

Son nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter 05 bidons de 20 litre d’huile de palme à 15000f le bidon et payer un transport de 7000f pour le revendre en détails dans son quartier. 

Les bénéfices réalisés sont destinés à la nourriture de son enfant.
texts.en:
This group of women have just agreed their eleventh loan. The women get on very well and have a good group spirit. They all work in commerce.

Méta (standing on the far right with her hand raised) is the group representative. She is a widow and has one daughter. Méta sells palm oil and will use her loan to buy five drums (each of twenty litres) of palm oil for 15,000 francs CFA each, and pay 7,000 francs CFA for transportation. She will then retail the oil in her neighbourhood. Her profits will buy food for her child.

loans.use: to buy 5 x 20 litre drums of palm oil and pay for transport.

loans.name: May Ann

texts.en:
May Ann is 30 years old and married with three children, two of whom are still in school, May Ann works very hard to provide for them.

May Ann runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, bread, snacks foods and other personal care products.

May Ann has been in this business for five years.

In the future, May Ann would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, bread, snacks foods and other personal care products.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 61 years old and married with four children.

Edna works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, bread, snacks foods and other personal care products.

Edna has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 31 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Edna aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, bread, snacks foods and other personal care products

loans.name: Hawa's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupement vient d’entamer son onzième cycle et est composé de femmes qui jouissent d’une bonne entente et d’un bon esprit de groupe. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Hawa (debout à l’extrême droite avec la main levée) est l’emprunteuse vedette du  groupe. Elle est âgée 35 ans, mariée et mère 03 enfants. Elle est vendeuse de tissus teintés qu’elle achète dans la sous région.

 Avec ce nouveau crédit elle compte acheter 20 coupons de tissus teintés à 75000et payer un transport de 25000f pour le revendre en détails dans son quartier.

Les bénéfices sont destinés à la dépense quotidienne et aux frais de scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group of women have just agreed their eleventh loan. They get on very well with one another and have a good group spirit. They all work in commerce.

Hawa (standing on the far right with her hand raised) is the group representative. She is thirty-five years old, married and mother to three children. She sells dyed fabric which she buys from the local area. Her loan will buy twenty rolls of dyed fabric for 75,000 francs CFA and pay 25,000 francs CFA for transportation. She will then retail the fabric in her neighbourhood.

Hawa will use her profits to pay for her day-to-day expenses and schooling for her children.

loans.use: to buy 20 rolls of dyed fabric and pay for transportation.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
Jean is 44 years old and has five children. She is married and four of her children are still in school.

Jean is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Jean requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vaccine, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pig.

Jean has been in this business for eight years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccine, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Mariama Binta's Group

texts.fr:
Inauguré depuis le 14 Décembre 2012,il existe une bonne connexion entre les membres du groupe. Elles vivent dans le même village et entretiennent des relations de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce. 

Madame Mariama, (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est veuve, et mère de 06 enfants dont 03 filles et 03 garçons. Elle est vendeuse de détergeant en poudre (OMO) et de miel.

 Avec son nouveau prêt, elle désire acheter 1 sac de 10 kg de détergeant à 7500f, payer un transport de 1000f et le revendre en détails dans son village et  02 bidons de 20 litre de miel à 40000f pour le revendre en détails et payer un transport de 11000f. 

Les bénéfices lui permettront de payer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group was created on 14th December 2012 and is a close-knit group. The women live in the same village and are very supportive of one another. They all work in commerce.

Mariama (standing on the far right with her hand raised) is the group representative. She is a widow and has six children (three girls and three boys). She sells Omo washing powder and honey. Her loan will buy a ten kilo sack of detergent for 7,500 francs CFA and two drums (each of twenty litres) of honey for 40,000 francs CFA. It will also pay total transportation costs of 12,000 francs CFA. Mariama then retails her products in her village.

Mariama will use her profits to pay for schooling for her children.

loans.use: to buy 1 x 10kg sack of detergent and 2 x 20 litre drums of honey, and pay for transportation.

loans.name: Halimatou's Group

texts.fr:
Inauguré depuis le 14 Décembre 2012, il existe une bonne connexion entre les membres du groupe. Elles vivent dans le même village et entretiennent des relations de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce. 

Madame Halimatou, âgée de 60 ans (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est veuve et mère de 02 enfants dont 01 garçon et 01 fille. Elle s’active dans la vente de lait frais qu’elle transforme en lait caillé.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 20 litre de lait frais par jour qu’elle transforme pour le revendre en détails.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de prendre en charge les besoins de la famille et de renforcer mon épargne.
texts.en:
This group was created on 14 December 2012 and works well together. The women all live in the same village and support one another well in their retail businesses.

Halimatou (sitting on the far right with her hand raised) is the group representative. She is sixty years old, widowed and mother to two children, one boy and one girl. She sells curdled milk. Her loan will buy twenty litres of fresh milk a day and she will process it into curdled milk and then sell it.

Halimatou will use her profits to provide for her family and increase her savings level.

loans.use: to buy 20 litres of fresh milk a day for processing.

loans.name: Hawa's Group

texts.fr:
Inauguré depuis le 14 Décembre 2012,il existe une bonne connexion entre les membres du groupe. Elles vivent dans le même village et entretiennent des relations de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.
 
Madame Hawa, (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 01 garçon et 04 filles. Elle s’active dans la vente de patte d'arachide qu’elle achète dans les marchés hebdomadaires.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 03 sceaux de 20 kg de patte d’arachide à 15000f le sceau payer un transport de 2500f pour le revendre en détails dans son village.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de prendre en charge les besoins de la famille (dépense quotidienne).
texts.en:
This group was created on 14 December 2012 and the members are mutually very supportive. The women all live in the same village and all work in retail.

Hawa (standing on the far right with her hand raised) is the group representative. She is married and mother to one boy and four girls. She sells peanut paste which she buys from the weekly market.

Hawa's loan will pay for three buckets (of twenty kilos each) of peanut paste for 15,000 francs CFA each. It will also pay 2,500 francs CFA for transportation. Hawa then sells the paste in her village. Her earnings will provide for the day-to-day needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy 3 x 20kg buckets of peanut paste and pay for transportation.

loans.name: Leona Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est constitué de treize membres qui s'activent dans le commerce et elles ont toujours remboursés leurs prêts avec succès. Madame Adama qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est mariée, âgée de 46 ans et mère de quatre enfants dont trois garçons. Depuis plus de sept années elle s'active dans la vente d'habits et de parfums hommes et femmes. Elle est très courageuse et très active dans son domaine d'activité. Les bénéfices vont servir à aider son mari à la prise en charge de la famille.
texts.en:
This group is made up of thirteen members who all work in commerce and have always repaid their loans on time.

Adama (on the right in the photo with her hand raised) represents the group. She is forty-six years old, married and mother to four children (of whom three are boys). She has been selling clothing and perfumes (for men and women) for more than seven years. She is a courageous woman and works very hard.

Adama's profits will help her husband provide for their family.

loans.use: to buy fabric and perfume.

loans.name: Leona Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de seize membres qui exercent tous le petit commerce et elles ont toujours remboursés leurs prêts sans difficultés. Madame Khady qui est la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est mariée, âgée de 33 ans et mère de six enfants dont quatre garçons. Elle s'active depuis plusieurs années dans la vente d'habits. Elle est une femme courageuse, très active dans son secteur d'activité. les bénéfices vont servir à aider son mari à la prise en charge de la famille.
texts.en:
This group is made up of sixteen members who work in commerce, and have always repaid their loans without difficulty.

Khady (on the right in the photo with her hand raised) represents the group. She is thirty-three years old, married and mother to six children (of whom four are boys). She has been selling clothing for several years. She is a courageous woman and works hard in her business. Her profits will help her husband provide for their family.

loans.use: to buy clothing for sale.

loans.name: Maria Belinda

texts.es:
Maria continúa con su negocio de venta de artículos de temporada a crédito. El crédito que obtuvo lo invirtió en la compra de edredones. El pago de sus cuotas fue puntual. Actualmente su negocio continuo funcionando, en esta oportunidad ella solicita un crédito para la compra de sabanas para la época de verano, “ya se termina el frío y pude terminar con la mercadería ahora a pensar en verano…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que las ventas son por temporadas, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de mercadería de temporada. Su sueño es abrir una tienda para dejar de ambular, ella desea comprar mercadería de temporada, como sabanas, batas de baño, toallas y otros. Esta es la 3 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Maria solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería de temporada para sus clientes de verano.
texts.en:
Maria continues working at her business selling clothing items on credit.

She used her last loan to invest in quilts. She was punctual with repayments. Maria's business continues to operate.

On this occasion she is applying for a loan in order to buy bed sheets for the summer season. She says, "The cold has gone and I was able to finish with the last stock. Now I'm thinking about the summer".

The advantage at Maria's business is that she sells products every season. The disadvantage is that she lacks capital to buy seasonal stock.

Maria's dream is to open a shop so that she does not have to work as a street vendor.

Maria wants to buy seasonal stock, such as sheets, bathrobes, towels, and more. This is Maria's third loan with the organisation in the ten years that she has been doing this work.

For the above reasons, Maria is applying for a loan in order to buy seasonal merchandise for her summer customers.

loans.use: to buy season merchandise for her summer customers.

loans.name: Nisreen

texts.en:
Greetings from Palestine. Nisreen is a 23-years-old married with no kids from Nablus city. She is a student in the university where she studies Information Technology . Her husband works in small company in the city where he gets a low and unstable income. Thus income is barely covers all the family needs.

Nisreen wants to take the BA degree and find a job in the future to support her family.
Nisreen took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to pay the university fees for the first semester. By taking this loan, Nisreen will be able to register in the university and pay part of the urgent expenses she has.
Nisreen appears in the photo
Nisreen is very grateful to everyone who helps her to achieve success in her studies with this loan.

loans.use: to pay the university fees for a degree in IT for the first semester.

loans.name: Gisela Argentina

texts.es:
Gisela a sus 27 años de edad reside en la ciudad capitalina desde hace 2 años, anteriormente vivía en compañía de sus padres quienes se dedican a la agricultura y a sus dos hermanos que actualmente apoyan a sus padres en el trabajo del hogar y se dedican a sus actividades estudiantiles, menciona lo difícil que ha sido no tener a su familia con ella, lo cual ha representado mucho sacrificio para ella ya que trabaja como docente de secundaria y por la noche se dedica a estudiar su maestría en Demografía y desarrollo. 
Anteriormente obtuvo su titulo universitario como licenciada en ciencias sociales,desea mejorar y aplicar sus conocimientos en esta área.
La sinceridad, la honestidad y la disposición de cooperación hacia los demás son consideradas las principales cualidades de Gisela, ya que desde pequeña le inculcaron valores y modales que puedan ser de bien a ella y a los demás.
Desea contribuir a su país, mediante el desarrollo de actividades directivas que puedan ser de provechos para muchas personas que desean superarse, ya que hoy en día el mundo laboral es cada vez mas exigente y estar atenta a los cambios puede resultar provechoso para cualquier profesional ejerciendo sus actividades laborales.
Su motivación para seguir estudiando y alcanzando sus metas, es su familia, ya que desde muy niña sus padres brindaron lo necesario y lo que ellos tenían para poder darle  a ella y a sus hermanos.
Gisela comenta que muchas veces los tropiezos son sinónimos de oportunidades ya que en su ultimo año no pudo iniciar su practica profesional en tiempo ya establecido si no hasta después de unos meses pero si hubiera hecho su practica cuando ella lo planeo, no hubiera obtenido la oportunidad de empleo que ahora tiene.
Desea culminar sus estudios de maestría, luego optar por una mejor oportunidad de empleo y a futuro desea cursar su doctorado en el extranjero.
texts.en:
At 27 years old, Gisela has been living in the capital city for two years. Previously she lived with her parents, who work in farming, and her two siblings, who currently both support their parents at home and study. Gisela says that it has been difficult not having her family with her; she has had to sacrifice a lot. Gisela works as a teacher in a secondary school and at night is studying for a Master's in demographics and development.

Gisela has an undergraduate degree in social sciences. She wants to enhance her knowledge and apply it in this field.

Honesty, sincerity and an openness to cooperation with others are Gisela's main qualities. From a young age she was taught values and morals that are good for her and for others.

Gisela wants to help her country through development work that can help many people who want to do better in life. Today the labour market is become more and more demanding, and being aware of changes can be advantageous for professionals.

Gisela's motivation to continue studying and achieve her goals is her family. Since she was a girl, Gisela's parents have provided what she needs, and given what they had to her and her siblings.

Gisela says that often setbacks are opportunities. For example, last year Gisela could not begin a placement on time but several months later. However, had she done her placement when she had originally planned, she would not have received a new job opportunity.

Gisela wants to finish her Master's and then find a better job. In the future she would like to study for a PhD abroad.

loans.use: to pay for a Master's in demographics and development.

loans.name: Faten

texts.en:
Greetings from Palestine. Faten is a 20-year-old married woman with no kids from Tubas near Nablus city. She is a student at the university where she studies Special Education. Her Husband works in a small company in the city where he gets a low and unstable income. Thus, income is barely enough to cover all the family needs. 

Faten wants to take a BA degree and find a job in the future to support her family. She is taking a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to pay her university fees for the first semester. By taking this loan, Faten will be able to register at the university and pay part of the urgent expenses she has.

Faten appears here in the photo. She is very grateful to everyone who helps her to achieve success in her studies with this loan.

loans.use: to pay her university fees for the first semester.

loans.name: Carma

texts.en:
Carma is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children. She earns a living by farming coconuts in the Philippines. She supplements this income with earnings from her general store. Carma successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Carma is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. She dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Merna

texts.en:
Merna is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with seven children, five of whom are in school. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of household goods to sell.

Merna industriously earns additional income through other business ventures, such as buying and selling fish. She dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of household goods to sell.

loans.name: Binalyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Binalyn works hard to support her family. She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and raising pigs. Binalyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business

Binalyn is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle transport. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

loans.name: Masa

texts.en:
Greetings from Palestine. Masa is a 25-year-old married woman with two kids from Nablus city. She is a student at the university where she studies Nursing. Her Husband works in a small company in the city where he receives a low and unstable income. Thus, their income is barely enough to cover all the family needs. 

Masa wants to take a BA degree and find a job in the future to support her family. She has taken a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to pay her university fees for the first semester. By taking this loan, Masa will be able to register at the university and pay part of the urgent expenses she has.

Masa appears here in the photo. She is very grateful to everyone who helps her to achieve success in her studies with this loan.

loans.use: to pay her university fee installments for this semester.

loans.name: Leona Group

texts.fr: Le banc villageois a été inauguré le 27 avril 2008. Ce groupe est constitué de seize femmes membres qui ont toujours remboursés leurs prêts avec succès et elles s'activent dans le commerce. Madame Maimouna qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est divorcée, âgée de 38 ans et mère de quatre enfants dont trois filles. Elle s'active depuis plusieurs années dans la vente de fruits. Elle a une très bonne maitrise de son activité. Les bénéfices vont servir à la prise en charge de ses enfants.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois was inaugurated on 27th April 2008 and this group is made up of 16 women who have always repaid their loans successfully; they all run small trading businesses.

Maimouna, who is on the right of the photo with her hand raised, is the group's representative. She is 38 years old, divorced and mother to four children, three of whom are girls. She has been selling fruit for several years and manages her business well. The profits she makes will be used to take care of her children.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Massiente E.

texts.fr: Mariée, Massienté a à sa charge deux enfants. Massienté est âgée de 35 ans et habite à Tokoin où elle vend  des plateaux d’œufs et des produits alimentaires. Massienté s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend sous un hangar au bord de la route. Massienté sollicite ce crédit pour commander des sacs de riz, des bidons d’huile et des plateaux d’œufs en vue de gagner des bénéfices et pouvoir soutenir son mari aux besoins de sa famille  puis améliorer ses conditions de vie quotidiennes.
texts.en: A married woman, Massienté has two dependent children. Massienté is 35 years old and lives in Tokoin where she sells egg trays and food products. Massienté gets her supplies twice a month at the market and resells them under a shed on the side of the road. Massienté asks for this credit to order bags of rice, cans of oil and egg trays with a view to make profit and be able to support her husband to meet her family's needs and also improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy 4 bags of rice, 4 cans of oil and 15 egg trays.

loans.name: Leona Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est constitué de huit membres dynamique qui s'activent dans le commerce et elles ont toujours remboursés leurs prêts sans difficultés. Madame Aminata qui est la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est mariée, âgée de 52 ans et mère de huit enfants dont cinq filles. Elle s'active depuis plus de cinq ans dans la vente de bouillie et dans le maraichage. Elle est très motivée et maitrise parfaitement son activité. Les bénéfices vont servir à aider son mari à la prise en charge des enfants et à épargner.
texts.en:
This group is made up of eight dynamic members who run small trading businesses; they have always repaid their loans without difficulty.

Aminata, who is on the right of the photo with her hand raised, is the group's representative. She is 52 years old, married and mother to eight children, five of whom are girls. She has been selling "bouillie" (a type of porridge) and doing market gardening for the past five years. She is very motivated and manages her business well. The profits she makes will be used to help her husband to look after the children and put aside in her savings.

loans.use: to buy millet and seeds.

loans.name: Foune's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe créé en août 2015,rassemble des membres qui habitent le même village et ont comme activité le petit commerce.

Diénaba qui se trouve à l'extrême droite de la photo et levant le bras,est la représentante du groupe,elle est mariée,est âgée de 39 ans et mére de 02 enfants.

Son activité est le commerce de légumes.Elle s'approvisionne au niveau du grand marché de la région avant de revendre dans son village.

Avec le crédit,elle compte acheter 15 kg de choux au prix unitaire de 1000f,15 kg de carottes à 600f le kg,26 kg de patates à 400f le kg et 13kg de poissons séchés à 1200f le kg.

Son objectif est d'augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
This group, which was set up in August 2015, is made up of members who live in the same village and have small trading activities.

Diénaba, who is on the far right of the photo with her hand raised, is the group's representative. She is 39 years old, married and mother to two children. She sells vegetables and gets her supplies in the region's Grand Market before reselling them in her village. With this loan she is planning to buy 15 kilos of cabbage at 1,000 francs each, 15 kilos carrots at 600 francs the kilo, 26 kilos of potatoes at 400 francs the kilo and 13 kilos of dried fish at 1,200 francs the kilo. Her aim is to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Sounkar's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe créé en août 2015 réunit des membres qui habitent le même village et ont comme activité le petit commerce.

Sira qui se trouve à l'extrême droite de la photo et levant le bras,est la représentante du groupe,elle est âgée de 29 ans et mére de 04 enfants dont 02 garçons.

Elle dispose d'un restaurant dans son village où elle vend du petit déjeuner et du déjeuner,elle pratique ce type d'activité depuis plus de 03 ans.

Avec le crédit,elle s'approvisionnera en huile pour 20litres à 825 l,15 baquettes de pain à 100f l'unité,10 sachets de café à 100f le sachet,01 pot de mayonnaise à 1000f le pot,01 pot de beurre à 2000f,un mouton à 20000f.

Son objectif est d'augmenter son épargne et assurer les besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
This group, which was created in August 2015, is made up of members who live in the same village and have small trading activities.

Sira, who is on the far right of the photo with her hand raised, is the group's representative. She is 29 years old and mother to four children, two of whom are boys. She has a restaurant in her village, where she sells breakfasts and lunches, and she has been carrying out this activity for more than three years.

With this loan she is going to buy 20 liters of oil at 825 francs the liter, 15 baguettes at 100 francs each, 10 sachets of coffee at 100 francs the sachet, a pot of mayonnaise for 1,000 francs, a pot of butter for 2,000 francs and a sheep for 20,000 francs. Her objective is to increase her savings and provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy coffee, bread, mayonnaise, sugar and butter.

loans.name: Diagone's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe qui vient d'être créé en août 2015,rassemble des membres qui habitent le même village et ont comme activité le petit commerce.

Adama qui se trouve à l'extrême droite de la photo,habillée en bleu et levant le bras,est la représentante du groupe,elle est âgée de 64 ans,est mariée et mére de 08 enfants dont 04 filles.

Son activité est le petit commerce,elle vend de l'huile,de l'arachide,des légumes.

Avec le crédit,elle va acheter 20l d'huile à 825f le litre,01 sac d'arachide de 50kg pour une valeur de 20000f,05 kg de carottes à 600f le kg,15kg de patate à 400f le kg et divers ingrédients pour 4500f.

Son objectif est d'augmenter son épargne et constituer un fonds de roulement assez fourni pour faire face à la demande.
texts.en:
This group which has just been created - in August 2015 - is made up of members who live in the same village and all have small trading activities.

Adama, who is on the far right of the photo, dressed in blue with her hand raised, is the group's representative. She is 64 years old, married and mother to eight children, four of whom are girls. She has a small trading business, selling oil, groundnut and vegetables.

With this loan she is going to buy 20 liters of oil at 825 francs the liter, a 50 kilo sack of groundnut to the value of 20,000 francs, five kilos of carrots at 600 francs the kilo, 15 kilos of potatoes at 400 francs the kilo and other diverse ingredients to the value of 4,500 francs. Her aim is to increase her savings and build up sufficient working capital to meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy oil, groundnut and vegetables.

loans.name: Victorine

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de deux enfants, Victoire  est une femme âgée de 22 ans résidant à Adidogomé. Victoire est une marchande  de produits d’alimentations générales qui s’approvisionne de ses marchandises deux fois par mois au marché et le revend sous un hangar à son domicile. Victoire  demande ce prêt pour commander des paniers de tomates fraîches, des bols de piment et des cartons de macaronis en vue d’avoir un stock important et maximiser son profit afin d’aider son mari à promouvoir l’éducation de ses enfants et à subvenir aux charges quotidiennes éprouvées par sa famille.
texts.en: Married and mother of two children, Victoire is a 22 year old woman living in Adidogomé. Victoire is a seller of general food products who supplies herself with goods twice a month at the market and resells them under a shelter at her home. Victoire asks for this loan to order baskets of fresh tomatoes, bowls of chili and boxes of macaroni with a view to have a large supply and maximise profit in order to help her husband advance her children's education and to support the daily burdens faced by her family.

loans.use: to buy 11 baskets of fresh tomatoes, 10 bowls of chili and 2 boxes of macaroni pasta.

loans.name: Eya

texts.fr: Eya est une femme mariée avec six enfants à charge. Eya est âgée de 28 ans et habite à Adidogomé où elle prépare et vend de la pâte bandée faite à base du maïs. Eya s’approvisionne du nécessaire servant à la préparation une fois par mois au marché et le revend à domicile puis dans les quartiers environnant. Eya sollicite ce crédit pour commander du maïs et des condiments afin de gagner plus de bénéfices en vue de soutenir les besoins de son foyer et d’améliorer ses conditions de vie quotidiennes.
texts.en: Eya is a married woman with 6 dependent children. Eya is 28 years old and lives in Adidogomé where she prepares and sells pâte bandée (corn mash).  Eya gets the supplies needed for preparation once a month at the market and re-sells it at home and also in the surrounding neighborhoods. Eya is asking for this credit to order corn and condiments in order to earn more profit with the aim of supporting her household needs and to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy 1 bag of corn and 1 glass of condiments.

loans.name: Angela

texts.en:
Angela is a 41-year-old hardworking married woman with two kids between the ages of 6 and 9 years, both of whom are in school. She is a beautician and has a salon situated at Akweteyman in Accra. Angela needs a loan of 1,000 GHS to help her buy more beauty supplies and credit cards to sell to her clients. She resides in Akweteyman in Accra and has been in this business for the past 20 years. 

Her first challenge is that she gets extremely tired during her busy days since she does not have a reliable person to take care of the place. Her second challenge is the power outage that the country is experiencing. Her plans are to get a generator in the future due to the power outage that the country is faced with currently. Angela wants to take this opportunity to thank the lenders of these loans and ask that they continue to help those who are ready to work hard like she is.

loans.use: To buy beauty items for her salon and call credits to sell to clients

loans.name: Cesar Alberto

texts.es:
Cesar requiere de más capital, por no contar en éste momento con liquidez suficiente, podrá comprar repuestos para el vehículo en que trabaja trasladando electrodomésticos, seguirá progresando y llevando el sustento diario a su hogar.
Al invertir el crédito anterior en su negocio ha tenido resultados positivos como: clientes satisfechos, ingresos para cancelar su deuda y comprar electrodomésticos para su hogar, agradece la ayuda recibida de Padecomsm y de los inversionistas Kiva para mantener con vida su negocio.
texts.en:
Cesar needs more capital because he does not have sufficient liquidity at the moment. He will purchase parts for the vehicle for his job moving appliances. He will continue to achieve progress and provide daily sustenance for his household.

Upon investing the prior loan in his business he has had positive results, such as: satisfied customers, income to cancel his debt, and the ability to purchase appliances for his home. He is grateful for the help he received from Padecomsm and the Kiva investors that is keeping his business alive.

loans.use: to purchase parts for the vehicle for his job moving appliances.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a 26-year-old hairdresser who resides and works at Dansoman in Accra. She is not married and does not have children. She provides hairdressing services to both the young and the elderly women in the community where the salon is situated and beyond. Gloria is a hardworking young lady and very friendly. She has been working for the past four years. She plans to establish her own salon in the future. 

This loan will help her to purchase a container and beauty supplies to sell to her customers. The challenge that she is faced with is the power outage that the country faces. She studied hairdressing after her basic education to become financially independent and help her mother take care of her younger sister. "I want to say a big thanks to all the lender of this loan and wish them well. I also want to invite them to visit Ghana."

loans.use: To buy beauty supplies and sell to customers

loans.name: Stefhanie Elizabeth

texts.es:
Stefhanie es una joven mujer de 29 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y estudia ingeniería industrial.
Ella es inteligente, soñadora y muy optimista. Sus estudios los realiza en la universidad pública, ubicada en el centro de la ciudad caracterizada por encontrarse al lado de comercios y edificios públicos.
Stefhanie es de tez morena, cabello largo y físico delgado, su lengua materna es el Aymara y habla español. Su vida la realiza en casa de sus padres que es propia y cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. Ella estudia la carrera de ingeniería industrial, posee competencias en las áreas del conocimiento lógico-matemático, habilidades como creatividad, facilidad de adaptación, ser inquieto en la búsqueda de nuevos conocimientos, ser proactivo en la solución de problemas, “estoy a media carrera y necesito urgente una computadora…” comenta. La ventaja de sus estudios es que le falta la mitad para terminar, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para comprar una computadora portátil. Su sueño es terminar de estudiar y trabajar en su área, ella desea comprar una computadora portátil para continuar con sus estudios. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 4 años que estudia.
Es por esos motivos que Stefhanie solicita un préstamo para comprar una computadora portátil para continuar con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Stefhanie is a young 29-year old woman. She is single, with no children, and studies industrial engineering. She is intelligent, a dreamer and very optimistic. She does her studies in a public university located in the center of the city, characterized for being next to businesses and public buildings.

Stefhanie is dark-skinned, with long hair and a thin physique. Her native language is Aymara and she speaks Spanish. She lives with her parents in their own home that has all of the basic services. She is studying industrial engineering. She has expertise in the areas of mathematical logistics, creativity skills, ability to adapt, being restless in the search for new knowledge, and being proactive in problem-solving.

"I am mid-career and I urgently need a computer..." she says. The advantage of her studies is that she is half-way finished. The disadvantage is the lack of money to buy a laptop. Her dream is to finish studying and work in her area. She wants to buy a laptop to continue with her studies.

This is the 1st loan with the institution in the 4 years that she has been studying. For those reasons, Stefhanie is asking for a loan to buy a laptop to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to buy a laptop to continue with her studies.

loans.name: Helen Evelyn

texts.es:
Helen, de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, sus padres la hicieron trabajar desde pequeña, porque eran una familia de escasos recursos; ahora está casada, su esposo es agricultor y junto a él tiene 2 hijas que están con ella en casa.

Helen, siembra maíz y yuca desde hace 20 años, aprendió porque sus padres le enseñaron desde muy pequeña, decidió dedicarse a la agricultura porque desde pequeña fue su única fuente de ingresos y conocía muy bien acerca de eso, además ella quería ayudarle a su esposo económicamente para cubrir los gastos de la casa; el lugar donde tiene sus cultivos está a 20 minutos de su casa y tiene que caminar para llegar hasta ahí; sus 2 hijos y su esposo le ayudan y trabajan desde las 5:00 a.m. hasta las 4:00 p.m.

Helen, necesita el préstamo para comprar 12 sacos de fertilizantes foleares y otros insumos agrícolas.

El sueño de Helen, es poder mejorar su vivienda, para darles una mejor condición de vida a sus hijas.
texts.en:
Helen is 35 years old and went to school until second grade. Her parents made her work from a young age because her family had scarce resources. Now she is married, her husband is a farmer and together they have two daughters, who live in their house with them.

Helen has been growing corn and yucca for 20 years. She learned this because her parents showed her since she was little. She decided to earn a living in agriculture because, since she was little, it was their only source of income and that's why she knows a lot about it. Furthermore she wanted to help her husband financially to cover household expenses.

The place where the have their field is located twenty minutes from her house and she has to walk to get there. Her two children and her husband help her and they work from 5 am until 4 pm.

Helen needs this loan to buy 12 bags of fertilizer and other agricultural supplies.

Helen's goal is to improve her home, to offer her daughters a better living situation.

loans.use: to buy 12 bags of fertilizer and other agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy second hand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, chickens, and animal feed

loans.name: Marta Julia

texts.es:
Marta, no tuvo la oportunidad de asistir a una escuela, ahora está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 6 hijos pero todos tienen sus propias familias y con ella solo vive un nieto.

Marta, se dedica junto a su pareja a la siembra de maíz, pipían y maicillo desde hace 37 años, fue con él con quien aprendió a trabajar en el campo, pero además de realizar esa actividad, ella también le gusta la crianza de ganado, pues tiene algunas vacas, también desde hace aproximadamente 10 años se dedica a la venta de tamales, pasteles de carne, tostadas de plátano y más; ella comienza su día a las 4:00 a.m. pues tiene que prepara el desayuno para su familia e irse a la milpa donde trabaja 6 horas.

El crédito será invertido para comprar 4 toretes de repasto.

Marta, sueña con mejorar su vivienda, porque le falta piso; pero también sueña con llegar a tener 10 vacas lecheras para producir lácteos.
texts.en:
Marta did not have the opportunity to go to school. Currently, she is married and her spouse works in agriculture. She has 6 children, but all of them have their own families and only one grandson lives with her.

Marta has worked, together with her spouse, planting corn, chiles and millet for more than 37 years. It was with her husband that she learned to work in the countryside, but in addition to doing this work, she also likes to raise livestock and she has some cows. For more than 10 years she has also worked selling tamales, meat pastries, fried bananas and more. Marta begins her day at 4 in the morning because she has to prepare breakfast for her family and she goes to the corn field where she works for 6 hours.

This loan will be invested in 4 pasture steers. Marta dreams of improving her home, because it lacks a floor, but she also dreams of having 10 milk cows to produce milk.

loans.use: to purchase four pasture steers.

loans.name: Ada Marilu

texts.es:
Ada, de 36 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, está casada, su esposo es militar y tienen 3 hijos, pero solo los 2 mayores están estudiando porque el menor está muy pequeño.

Ada, tiene una maquina para cocer ropa, ella elaborar prendas de vestir desde hace 8 años, pero también cultiva maíz desde hace 15 años y en este trabajo le ayuda su hijo mayor; el lugar donde cultiva está a 30 minutos de su casa y viaja a pie, su horario de trabajo es desde las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 12:00 del mediodía.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar 5 sacos de abono fóleres.

El sueño de Ada, es poder ayudar a sus hijos para que estudien una carrera universitaria.
texts.en: Ada is 36-years old. She went to school until the 8th grade. She is married and has 3 children with her husband who is in the military. Only the 2 older children are in school because the youngest is very little. Ada has a machine for sewing clothing. She has made items of clothing for 8 years and has also grown corn for 15 years. Her eldest son helps her with that job. The place where she grows corn is 30 minutes from her house and she travels on foot. Her work schedule is from 6 AM to 12 PM. She needs the loan to buy 5 bags of foliar fertilizer. Ada's dream is to be able to help her children so that they can study towards a college degree.

loans.use: to buy 5 bags of foliar fertilizer.

loans.name: Mujeres Del Mañana Group

texts.es: Jovanna es una mujer emprendedora madre de  cuatro hijos dos en edad escolar se dedica a hacer recargas ,reparación y ventas de celulares y  a atender en cabina de internet al lado de su esposo desde hace siete años se siente orgullosa de lo que hace ya que así ha podido sacar adelante a sus hijos y darles una mejor calidad de vida, en el negocio de internet sus principales clientes son niños que van a jugar .el préstamo que solicitó lo invertirá en la compra de carcasas, fundas, cargadores y afines, para implementar el negocio de ventas de celulares Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por el apoyo prestado y dice que sacará provecho al máximo
texts.en: Jovanna is an entrepreneurial woman who is a mother of four school aged children. For seven years, she has worked selling cell recharges, and repairing and selling cell phones, and offering internet service in booths with her husband. She is proud of what she does because this is how she has been able to get her children ahead and give them a better quality of life. In the internet business her main customers are children who go to play. She will invest the loan she has asked for in buying phone cases, bags, chargers and similar items to outfit her cell phone selling business. She is grateful to the Kiva investors for their support and she says she will take maximum advantage of it.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as bags, phone cases, cell phones and more.

loans.name: Dúo Flor Del Molino Group

texts.es: Dúo Flor del Molino doña Balvina vive en san Martin Jilotepeque. Balvina se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tejidos y bordados típicos.  Tiene un hijo de tres años por el cual lucha diariamente para darle lo mejor para que crezca sano y sea un hombre de bien. sus bordados los vende en su casa y algunas en el mercado de la localidad. Sus pagos los a hecho según sus fechas de pagos. Esta agradecida con  los inversionistas que la apoyan y le pide Dios por Kiva y Fape para que sigan adelante en su misión, solicita el crédito para comprar telas, hilos y materiales para bortar.
texts.en:
Balvina of Dúo Flor del Molino lives in San Martín Jilotepeque. Balvina makes a living through the production and sale of traditional cloth and embroidery. She has a son who is three years old and she strives every day to give him the best so he can grow healthy and be a reputable man. She sells her embroideries in her house as well as some in the local market. She has made her payments according to her dates of required payments.

She is grateful for the investors that support her and she prays to God for Kiva and FAPE so they can continue in their mission. She is asking for a loan to buy fabric, thread and materials to embroider.

loans.use: to buy materials to create traditional embroidery and fabrics for sale.

loans.name: Dúo Mariposas Group

texts.es: Dúo Mariposas Doña Enma 43 años es casada tiene 4 hijos de 18, 20, 17, y 16 años 2 de ellos estudian ella es dueña de un taller de costura llamado taller enma quiere invertir su crédito en comprar  telas, conos, hilos, ahujas y darle mantenimiento a una máquina de coser  ella inicio su negocio por la falta de dinero en el hogar y la necesidad de estudios de sus hijos y apoyar con los gastos de su hogar sus clientes son  vecinos y gente de fuera de la colonia  ella trabaja con sus hijos en este proyecto quienes le ayudan en sus tiempos libres sus metas son poder mejorar la calidad de vida, mejorar sus ingresos, fortalecer el negocio y poder pagar los gastos de su casa, a tenido 4 préstamos con fape los cuales le Han ayudado a subir la clientela y poder  construir un cuarto donde actual mente tiene su taller de costura . Y con la ayuda de fape  podrá terminar la construcción que empezó de su taller.
texts.en:
Enma, from the Dúo Mariposas group, is 43 years old. She is married and has four children who are 18, 20, 17 and 16 years old. Two of them are studying in school. She is the owner of a seamstress shop called "Enma's Studio." She wants to invest her loan in the purchase of fabric, cones, threads, needles and to provide maintenance to a swing machine.

Enma began her business because of the lack of money in her home, and the need for her children to study and for her to support the expenses of her home. Her customers are neighbors and people from outside the town. She works with her children on this project. They help her in their free time.

Enma's goals are to be able to improve her quality of life, increase her income, strengthen the business and to be able to pay for the expenses of her home. She has had four loans with Fape which have helped her to increase her clientele and to construct a room where she currently keeps her sewing shop. With the help of Fape she will be able to complete the construction that she began on her shop.

loans.use: to purchase tools (a sewing machine) to create clothing.

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es:
SEGUNDO TIENE 66 DE EDAD,CONVIVIENTE, NO TIENE HIJOS BAJO SU RESPONSABILIDAD, VIVE en CASA DE MATERIAL RUSTICO EN EL CASERIO JUAN BAUTISTA, DEL DISTRITO DE CALLACYUC, REGION CAJAMARCA, SIERRA NORTE DE PERU.

SEGUNDO SE DEDICA A LAS LABORES AGRICOLAS CULTIVANDO CAFE,HACE 10 AÑOS, CON MUY BUENAS REFERENCIAS LABORALES Y PERSONALES DE PARTE DE SUS CLIENTES. EL CREDITO OTORGADO LO UTILIZARÁ PARA COMPRAR DE ABONOS Y INVERSIÓN MANTENIMIENTO DE SU FINCA.DE ESTA MANERA OBTENDRÁ MAYORES RENDIMIENTOS PODRA MEJORAR SUS NIVELES DE INGRESO Y POR ENDE SU CALIDAD DE VIDA Y LA DE SU FAMILIA.
texts.en:
Segundo is 66-years old. He has a partner and does not have any children under his responsibility. He lives in a rustic house in the small village of Juan Bautista, in the district of Callacyuc, Cajamarca region, on the northern highlands of Peru.

Segundo has worked in agriculture, growing coffee, for 10 years and has very good work and personal references from his customers.

The given loan will be used to buy fertilizer and invest in the maintenance of his farm. This way, he can get a better performance and will be able to improve his income level, thus improving the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and invest in the maintenance of his farm.

loans.name: Dúo Joyas Valiosas Group

texts.es:
Dúo Joyas Valiosas
Este dúo lo forma. Marta de 24 años de edad, es propietaria de una tienda de consumo desde hace más de seis años. Con su negocio a apoyado a su familia pero especialmente a su mama, en los gastos de estudios para sus hermanos.  Es el tercer crédito que solicita en los anteriores a pagado cumpliendo sus fechas de pago. Su sueño es ampliar aun mas su tienda para obtener más ganancias y así seguir apoyando a su familia que tanto lo necesita.  Solicita el crédito para comprar artículos de consumo diario. Agradece a los inversionistas por apoyarla en su negocio y les envía muchas bendiciones.
texts.en:
Dúo Joyas Valiosas [Duo Precious Jewels]

Part of this duo is Marta. She is 24 years old and has been the owner of a consumer goods store for more than six years.

With her business she is supporting her family, especially her mom, with her brother's student fees. This is the third loan she is requesting. On her previous loan she complied with her payment dates.

Her goal is to extend her business to make more profit and thus keep on supporting her family, which needs it so dearly.

She is requesting a loan to buy goods for daily consumption. She is very thankful to all investors for supporting her business and sends them many blessings.

loans.use: to buy comestible goods to sell.

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es:
María, vive con su hija mayor de edad, la cual es independiente; María se dedica a elaborar charamuscas y choco bananos, lo hace a tiempo completo, su ventaja es que el negocio está ubicado en su vivienda y en las cercanías de una escuela, al realizar esta actividad puede cubrir sus gastos.
Solicita un crédito para fortalecer su negocio, comprara golosinas, bebidas, fruta, pasta de chocolate y otros productos que sean necesarios para atraer nuevos clientes, su esperanza es que las ventas y ganancias mejoren.
Sus aspiraciones son mantener su negocio en el mercado para tener una mejor vida.
texts.en:
María lives with her older, independent daughter. She works making charamuscas (candy twists) and choco bananos (chocolate-dipped bananas) full-time. Her advantage is that her business is located in her home and next to a school. By doing this job, she can cover her expenses.

She is asking for a loan to strengthen her business. She will buy candy, soft drinks, fruit, chocolate pastries and other products that are needed to attract new customers. Her wish is that her sales and earnings improve. Her aspiration is to maintain her business in the market to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy candy, soft drinks, fruit, chocolate pastries and other products that are needed to attract new customers.

loans.name: Dúo Maranatha Group

texts.es: Dúo Maranatha Romelia de 49 años de edad, es madre de 3 hijos los cuales ya son independientes. El negocio al cual se dedica es la venta de ropa americana y otros productos, como por ejemplo dulces, cosméticos sopas y café.  Hace mas de 20 años se dedica a este negocio y agradece a fape y kiva la oportunidad que le a brindado en estos 4 créditos ya culminados. Romelia nuevamente solicita un nuevo crédito para la invertir en la compra  de ropa americana. Su sueño es tener mas negocios y tener un mejor estilo de vida
texts.en: From the Maranatha Duo, Romelia is 49-years old. She is the mother of 3 children who are independent. The business that she works in is selling American clothing and other products. For example, candy, cosmetics, soups and coffee. She has been doing this job for more than 20 years and she thanks FAPE and Kiva for the opportunity that she has been given with the 4 previous loans. She is asking for a new loan to buy American clothing. Her dream is to have more businesses and a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing to sell.

loans.name: Jamal

texts.en:
Jamal is a 54-year-old married man from Rafah city, which is located in the Gaza Strip and suffers from power outages 12 to 16 hours a day regularly. He lives with his family in a small house. As an employee in the public sector, he earns a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs.

Because he is not able to save enough money, Jamal took a USD loan from FATEN. With this loan, he will buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. Palestinians use water boilers that use either gas or gasoline to heat the water before a shower, which can be dangerous, expensive and inefficient. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity, which is much more expensive.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal ILLARY III, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Carlos sigue dedicándose a brindar el servicio de transporte a sus clientes que le solicitan, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a su negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones personales, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para hacer el cambio de aceite.
El socio se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank ILLARY III, which is located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Carlos continues to make a living by providing transportation service to his clients that ask him to. He is a responsible and diligent person and has dedicated himself to his business for a long time which brings him personal satisfaction, since in this way he provides for his family.

He is asking for this loan to get an oil change. He promises to fulfill his established quotas.

loans.use: to get an oil change.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is working as a waiter and she also is going to college. Regina is living with her parents, but she would like to be an independent woman. Regina is single. She doesn't have children.

She needs a loan to pay her college tuition. Regina is a responsible woman. She works hard and she is doing her best to be ok at college. She hopes you can help her.

loans.use: to pay her college tuition.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.en:
Pablo is a 68-year-old man, married since a long time ago, long enough to see his sons make their own ways and get families of their own.

He had an accident on his previous job, so he decided to quit it and start a roast chicken business. He has being doing really well because the area around his roast chicken store has being developing lately. The area population has increased and so has the demand for roasted chicken.

He wants to meet his clients' demand, and to do so he needs to increase his chicken stock. Soon he will need to open another establishment. To succeed in the first one and get started with the second one, he is looking for a 13,000 MXN loan.

loans.use: to increase his stock and expand his business.

loans.name: Angielyn

texts.en:
Angielyn is 21 years old. She is married and has one child still in school. Angielyn is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Angielyn requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

Angielyn has been in this business for 2 years now and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Ayman

texts.en:
Ayman is a 24-year-old single man from Rafah city, which is located in the Gaza Strip and suffers from power outages 12-16 hours a day regularly. He lives with his family in a small house. As an employee in the public sector, he earns a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs.

Because he is not able to save enough money, Ayman took a USD loan from FATEN. With this loan, he will buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. Palestinians use water boilers that use either gas or gasoline to heat the water before a shower, which can be dangerous, expensive, and inefficient. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity, which is much more expensive.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house

loans.name: Villa Milagros Group

texts.es: Sandra es una mujer emprendedora madre de dos hijos de siete y dos años de edad vive con su esposo y sus suegros, se dedica a la venta de piñateria en un mercado cerca a su casa se animo poner este negocio ya que no habia nadie con ese rubro,sus principales clientes son niños que llevan a sus padres para que les compren juguetes cd y señoras que van por las piñatas y golosinas para las fiestas infantiles de sus hijos,se siente muy feliz con los inversionistas Kiva por el préstamo que a logrado ya que le ha permitido ampliar mas su negocio en la compra de piñatas,golosinas,juguetes y demás pide que sigan siempre así y ayuden a gente que desea salir adelante.
texts.en:
Sandra is a hard-working woman and the mother of two children, two and seven years of age. She lives with her husband and mother and father-in-law. She makes her living by selling piñatas in a market close to her house. She was excited to start this business since there wasn't anyone else in this line of work.

Her usual clients are children that bring their parents to buy them toys and CDs and women who go to buy piñatas and candy for their children's parties. She feels happy with the investors at Kiva for the loan that she has received that has allowed her to expand her business by buying piñatas, candy, toys and more. She asks that they always keep doing this and help people that want to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy materials such as piñatas, candy, CDs and toys.

loans.name: Breni

texts.en:
Breni runs a variety store. She is happily married and has three children. At 57, she still strives hard to earn a living.

Breni would like to increase her stocks of grocery items, chicken, fish and pork. That's why she's borrowing a loan of PHP 15,000. She believes that she could attain her goal for her variety store and improve her living situation someday.

Breni would be grateful if her requested loan were granted.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, pork, chicken and fish to sell.

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is 44 years old. She is married and has six children, three of whom are in school.

Merlita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years now and has borrowed once in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Merlita requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

In the future, Merlita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is a married woman who is 57 years old and has one child.

Susana is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been in this business for seven years now and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Susana requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

In the future, Susana would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Dorina

texts.en:
Dorina is 37 years old, married, and has three children, who are in school.

Dorina is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years now and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Dorina requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

In the future, Dorina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Vangie

texts.en:
Vangie is a married woman with two children presently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Vangie is 38 years old.

Vangie has a business buying and selling recycled materials in the Philippines. Vangie requested a 15,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy more sacks of recycled materials to sell.

Vangie has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of recycled materials to sell.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Lilibeth works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Lilibeth is borrowing 18,000 PHP through NWTF to buy an additional bundle of fishing net for her fishing business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business. Lilibeth has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy an additional bundle of fishing net.

loans.name: Purification

texts.en:
Purification is one of the pionering members of Paglaum MPC and has availed many loan products that helped her on her business ventures and other personal needs. She nurtures her membership with the cooperative without records of default payments.

This time, she asks for a loan to pay for a medical check up and maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to pay for a medical check up and maintenance medicines.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Marilyn is 37 years old.

Marilyn has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines. Marilyn has been in this business for 10 years.

Marilyn requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell.

In the future, Marilyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of seven children, Roselyn works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling coconuts in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling charcoal. Roselyn is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional coconuts to sell in her stall.

Roselyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional coconuts to sell in her stall.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Helen is 53 years old and has one child still in school.

Helen has a fishing business in the Philippines. Helen requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fishing net, gasoline for her boat, bamboo, and other materials for her fishing business.

Helen has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing net, gasoline for her boat, bamboo, and other materials for her fishing business.

loans.name: Maria Lina

texts.en:
Maria Lina is 44 years old and married. She has four children. One of her children is in school. Maria Lina works very hard to provide for them.

Maria Lina runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for one year and sells a variety of items.

Maria Lina requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, personal care products, and other groceries.

In the future, Maria Lina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, personal care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Satiaga

texts.en:
Satiaga is a 54-year-old married woman with six children, 1 attends school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Satiaga has had a fish vending business for 15 years and requests 17,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fish to sell to her customers.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy  fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Levita

texts.en:
Levita works hard to support her family. Levita is married and has raised pigs for 4 years. She requests 14,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pig.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and requests an additional loan to further build her business

In the future, Levita would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pig.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with one child.

She grows rubber trees and is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase fertilizer.

She supplements this income operating a general store and raising pigs.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and requests an additional loan to further build her business

Wilma dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Merly works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from food vending. Merly is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy fishing materials like gasoline, fishing net, etc. for her fishing business.

Merly has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials like gasoline, fishing net, etc

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
