As a married parent of four children, Alma works hard to support her family. She has a pig fattening business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from buying and selling fish and from fishing. Alma is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pig fattening business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business. Alma has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en:
Theresa is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients like spices, meat, vegetables, canned goods, etc for her food vending business.

Theresa has been in this business for 5 years. She earns more income from buying and selling fish. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like spices, meat, vegetables, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Luzviminda works hard to support her family.  She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and she also earns income from buying and selling fish.  Luzviminda is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional materials, like paint, wood, bamboo, etc., for her fishing boat for her fishing business.

Luzviminda has sustained her business activities through two prior loans from NWTF.  She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials, like paint, wood, bamboo, etc., for her fishing boat.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 48 years old and married with seven children, five of whom are in school.  She works hard to provide for her family.  She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

Prior to this loan, Jocelyn has borrowed and repaid 15 loans from NWTF.  She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns income from farming rice and raising pigs.  She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.  Jocelyn aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Marylou

texts.en:
Marylou is 44 years old, married, and works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from buying and selling accessories.  Marylou is borrowing 11,000 PHP through NWTF to buy spare parts for the maintenance for her motorcycle.

Marylou has sustained her business activities through two prior loans from NWTF.  She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is a hardworking female entrepreneur with eight children.  She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines.  She is borrowing 14,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

She supplements this income by buying and selling rice.  She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.  Yolanda dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Leciel

texts.en:
Leciel is a hardworking entrepreneur who buys and sells fish in the Philippines.  She is borrowing 23,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell for her business.

Leciel has been in this business for 5 years, and she earns additional income from working at a general store and raising pigs.  She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

Leciel has sustained her business activities through her own efforts and through loans from NWTF.  She dreams of saving enough money to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is a hardworking female entrepreneur with six children, five of whom are in school.  She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, such as chips, bread, milk, coffee, can goods, etc.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures, like raising pigs.  Melanie successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.  Melanie dreams that, one day, she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like chips, bread, milk, coffee, can goods, etc.

loans.name: Ulderica

texts.en:
Ulderica is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines.  She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Ulderica has been in this business for 30 years, and she earns additional income from buying and selling fish.  She has sustained her business activities through her own efforts and through loans from NWTF.  She dreams of saving enough money to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 21-year-old, married man from a small village near Nablus, an ancient city located in the West Bank.  He manages and operates a small restaurant, where he sells light sandwiches and soft drinks for day laborers and children after school.  The community enjoys his sandwiches, and it is a very good business, which provides his family with good income.

Because he wanted to buy some supplies for his restaurant, Mohammad took a loan from FATEN.  With this loan, he can buy a refrigerator and other supplies to improve his restaurant.  Mohammad wants to improve his business by making fresh fruit cocktails, so he needs to store perishable items in the refrigerator.  (The photo shows Mohammad working.)

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and other supplies to improve his restaurant.

loans.name: Shahid

texts.en: Greetings from Palestine. Shahid is an 18-years-old single lady from Nablus city, she is a student in the university where she studies Arabic literature. Her father works in a small company in the city where he gets a low and unstable income. Thus, income barely covers all the family needs. Shahid wants to earn a BA degree and find a job in the future to support her family. Shahid took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to pay the university fees for the first semester. By taking this loan, Shahid will be able to register in the university and pay part of the urgent expenses she has. Shahid appears in the photo. She is very grateful to everyone who helps her to achieve success in her study with this loan.

loans.use: to pay the university fees for the first semester.

loans.name: Asim

texts.en:
Asim is a 22-year-old single man from Gaza city, which is located in the Gaza Strip and suffers from power outages 12-16 hours a day regularly. He lives with his family in a small house. As an employee in the public sector, he earns a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs.
Because he is not able to save enough money, Asim took a USD loan from FATEN. With this loan, he will buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. Palestinians use water boilers that use either gas or gasoline to heat the water before a shower, which can be dangerous, expensive and inefficient. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity, which is much more expensive.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Charyss Antonette

texts.en:
Charyss Antonette is 30 years old and is married with three children, two of whom are in school.  She works very hard to provide for her children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional goods to sell, like noodles, eggs, milk, sugar, coffee, etc.

Charyss Antonette has been in this business for two years.  In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods to sell, like noodles, eggs, milk, sugar, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Dina

texts.en:
Dina is 39 years old, married, and has three children, two of whom are in school.  She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines.  Dina requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Dina has been pig fattening for 10 years now, and she has borrowed 26 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.  She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 32 years old and married with seven children, two of whom in school. Elizabeth works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, canned goods, eggs, milk, soap, etc.

Elizabeth has been in this business for 12 years. In the future Elizabeth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, canned goods, eggs, milk, soap, etc.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn works hard to support her family. Evelyn is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

Evelyn has been in this business for seven years now.

In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his job

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz works hard to support her family. Luz is widowed and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Luz has been in this business for 10 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Delmery

texts.en:
Delmery works hard to support her family. Delmery is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF to purchase materials for her fishing business like bamboo, wood, gasoline and fishing net.

Delmery has been in this business for eight years now.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her fishing business like bamboo, wood, gasoline and fishing net

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena works hard to support her family. Rowena is married and has a buy and sell banana business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of banana to sell.

Rowena has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Rowena would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of banana to sell.

loans.name: Ermila

texts.en:
Ermila is married with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ermila is 52 years old and has two children who are in school.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines. Ermila requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional fishing net.

Ermila has been in this business for seven years. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica works hard to support her family. Veronica is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Veronica has been in this business for 16 years now.

In the future, Veronica would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Gretchen

texts.en:
Gretchen is 29 years old; she is married with one child.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell like chips, bread, canned goods, soap, coffee, etc.

Gretchen has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for one year and also earns an income from pre-paid mobile load.

Gretchen aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell like chips, bread, canned goods, soap, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Isabelita

texts.en:
Isabelita is 40 years old and married with four children, three of whom are in school. Isabelita works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Isabelita has been in this business for five years.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is 39 years old and has eight children. Luzviminda is married and four of her children are in school.

Luzviminda is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional feed and rice bran for her pigs.

Luzviminda has been in business for five years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Luzviminda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and rice bran for her pigs.

loans.name: Mailyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Mailyn works hard to support her family.  She has a restaurant business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from raising pigs.  Mailyn is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients, like meat, fish, etc., for her restaurant.

She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.  Mailyn has sustained her business activities through 12 prior loans from NWTF.  She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients, like meat, fish, etc., for her restaurant.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is 38 years old and is married with four children, three of whom are in school.  Marissa works very hard to provide for her children.

She buys and sells rattan, which is used to make furniture, in the Philippines, and she requested a 21,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more rattan to sell.  Marissa has been in this business for nine years.  In the future, she would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more rattan (used for furniture making) to sell.

loans.name: Diana

texts.en: Greetings from Palestine. Diana is a 19-year-old single lady from Tubas near Nablus city. She is a student in the university where she studies Administration Offices. Her father works in a small company in the city where he gets a low and unstable income. Thus income barely covers all the family needs. Diana wants to take the BA degree and find a job in the future to support her family. Diana took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to pay the university fees for the first semester. By taking this loan, Diana will be able to register in the university and pay part of the urgent expenses she has. Diana appears in the photo. Diana is very grateful to everyone who helps her to achieve success in her study with this loan.

loans.use: to pay the university fees for the first semester.

loans.name: Marthe's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été crée depuis le cycle premier du banc villageois .Il regroupe des femmes issues du même village et unies par de bonnes relations sociales et professionnelles.
Madame Marthe est la responsable,elle est divorcée et mère de deux enfants dont une fille et un garçon tous scolarisés.
Madame Marthe s'active dans la culture depuis bientôt dix ans elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine.
Avec son nouveau crédit de 500000 francs CFA elle va se payer du matériel d'exploitation, de l 'engrais et des semences pour faire de la culture au niveau de son petit jardin dans son village.
Les bénéfices tirés de son activité lui permettent de prendre en charge les besoins alimentaire de sa famille et de renforcer ses épargnes au niveau du banc villageois.
texts.en:
This group has been created since the banc villageois's first cycle. It brings together women from the same village who are linked by good social and professional ties.

Mrs Marthe is the leader, she is divorced and the mother of two children, one girl and one boy, who both attend school. Mrs Marthe has been working in crop-growing for almost ten years and she has a good experience in this field.

WIth her new 500,000 FCFA loan, she will purchase operating equipment, fertiliser and seeds to grow crops in her little garden in her village. The profits from this activity will allow her to take care of her family's food needs and to build her savings at the banc villageois.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertiliser for growing crops.

loans.name: Dung

texts.en:
Dung is 62 years old, and she is married.  She has been working in agriculture as a farmer for more than 10 years, and she lives in the Tinh Gia district, a rural town in the Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low income household and does not have enough income to lead a comfortable life.  One of her most critical concerns is not having a hygienic latrine, so she is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a new toilet.

This is Dung's first loan with the Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.  She hopes that this loan could make her little dream come true.  In the future, Dung hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her to be able to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a new toilet.

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.

She supplements this income with earnings from her fishing.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Nena dreams that one day she will be able to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is 49 years old married with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Elsa requested a PHP 25,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Elsa has been in this business for six years. In the future, Elsa would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with six children, four of whom are in school.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines and is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to purchase sacks of rice seeds and other farm supplies.

She supplements this income with earnings from her general store.

Anita dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of rice seeds and other farm supplies

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a restaurant business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like meat, vegetables, spices, fish, etc for her restaurant business.

Analyn has been in this business for 20 years. Analyn earns more income from raising livestock.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like meat, vegetables, spices, fish, etc.

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, two of whom are in school, Leonila works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell fruits and vegetables business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice. Leonila is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy more stocks of fruits and vegetable to sell for her buy and sell fruits and vegetables business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business

Leonila has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of fruits and vegetable to sell.

loans.name: Mecaila

texts.en:
Mecaila works hard to support her family.  She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.  Mecaila requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional fishing net.

She has been in this business for two years now.  In the future, Mecaila would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net.

loans.name: Rosana

texts.en:
Rosana is 41 years old and is married with two children.  She works very hard to provide for her children.

She buys and sells rattan, which is used to make furniture, in the Philippines, and she requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional rattan to sell.

Rosana has been in this business for 5 years.  In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional rattan (used for furniture making) to sell.

loans.name: Gita

texts.en:
Gita is 42 years old and married with three children.

Gita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell like soap, shampoo, milk, chips, bread, and soft drinks.

Gita has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this one. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like soap, shampoo, milk, chips, bread, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bread, dressings, spices, firewood, etc., in order to prepare the sale of her products.

loans.name: Wassa

texts.fr: Agée de 32 ans, Wassa est une femme mariée et mère de deux enfants vivant  à Tokoin. Pour soutenir sa famille, Wassa vend des mèches dans son salon de coiffure et s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Wassa réalise sa rentabilité dans son activité et pour bien satisfaire aux attentes de ses clients, Wassa demande ce prêt pour commander des douzaines de mèches afin d’élargir son niveau de commerce et aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire et à couvrir les frais scolaire dès la rentrée à venir.
texts.en:
Aged 32 years, Wassa is a married woman and mother of two children living in Tokoin. To support her family, Wassa sells hair extensions in her hairdressing salon and gets her purchases twice per month at the market.

Wassa is profitable in her activity and in order to best satisfy her client's needs, she is requesting this loan to order dozens of hair extensions so as to increase her level of trade, help her children in their school education and cover school fees for this new school year.

loans.use: to buy eight dozen hair extensions

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en:
Mrs Thanh is 58 years old and married. She has been working in agriculture as a farmer for more than 10 years.

Thanh lives in Tinh Gia district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village, as the income from this business is not high enough for what she really needs to live a comfortable life. One of the most critical difficulties is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a new toilet.

This is Thanh's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She hopes that this loan can make her little dream come true.

In the future, Thanh hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: To purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a new toilet.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of seven children, Raquel works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Raquel is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials like wood, paints, nails, etc for her new boat for her fishing business.

Raquel has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like wood, paints, nails, etc for her new boat.

loans.name: Edelyn

texts.en:
Edelyn is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with six children.

She earns a living by farming corn in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase new variety of corn and fertilizers for her farm.

She supplements this income with earnings from her general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Edelyn dreams that one day she will be able to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase new variety of corn and fertilizers for her farm.

loans.name: Jiely

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Jiely works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Jiely is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to purchase a fishing net and gasoline for her fishing business.

Jiely has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fishing net and gasoline.

loans.name: Renalate

texts.en:
Renalate is 34 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Renalate is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy fertilzers and other farm supplies.

Renalate has been farming rice for 12 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling dried fish.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilzers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
Salvacion works hard to support her family. Salvacion is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional fishing materials like fishing net, gasoline, bamboo, etc.

Salvacion has been in this business for 5 years now. In the future, Salvacion would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing materials like fishing net, gasoline, bamboo, etc

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es una señora casada de 45 años de edad, trabaja en un restaurante de comida como encargada. Se encuentra a cargo de su mamá desde que sufrió una caída donde se lastimo la cadera, su mamá es una persona de la tercera de edad y sufre de cataratas en el ojo izquierdo por lo que requiere ser operada ya que corre el riesgo de perder la vista en ese ojo. Como  hija quiere que su mama tenga una  mejor calidad de vida en los años que le quedan de vida.
texts.en: This lady is 45 years old and married.  She works at a restaurant as the manager.  Her mother is under her care since she suffered a fall where she hurt her hip.  Her mother is elderly, and she has cataracts in her left eye.  Therefore, she needs surgery because she runs the risk of losing her vision in this eye.  As her daughter, she wants her mother to have a better quality of life in the years that she has left.

loans.use: to pay for ophthalmic treatment.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 29 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of can goods, soap, milk, etc.

Wilma has been in this business for 2 years. In the future Wilma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of can goods, soap, milk, etc.

loans.name: Lorie

texts.en:
Lorie is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like can goods, eggs, chips, soft drinks, soap, shampoo, etc.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like buying and selling fish. Lorie dreams that one day she will be able to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like can goods, eggs, chips, soft drinks, soap, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Erma

texts.en:
Erma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to buy an additional gallon of gasoline, a new fishing net, etc for her fishing business.

Erma has been in this business for five years. Erma earns more income from buying and selling fruits and vegetables.

Erma has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family in the future.

loans.use: to buy an additional gallon of gasoline, a new fishing net, etc.

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Mrs Lan is 35 years old and married. She has been working in agriculture as a farmer for more than 10 years. Lan lives in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in the village, as market demand is low in this region. The income from this business is not high enough for what she really needs to build a comfortable life.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet. This is Lan's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. She hopes that this loan can make her little dream come true.

In the future, Lan hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Zencerly

texts.en:
Zencerly is a 31-year-old, married woman from Duero, Bohol. For eight years now she has been making pork cracklings, locally known as "chicharon." These are made of pork skin and can be eaten like chips for snacks or can be dipped in vinegar and eaten with rice. Pork cracklings are one of Filipinos' favorite snacks.

Zencerly also makes candies out of sweet potatoes. She is asking for a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy pork skin, cooking oil, seasoning, salt and plastic cellophane.

She has four children, ages 4, 10, 13 and 15. Zencerly and her husband work hard for their children. She hopes that they can finish their studies.

In the future, she hope to secure a better location in the market so she can expand her customer base and increase business profits for her family.

loans.use: to buy pork skin, cooking oil, seasoning, salt and plastic cellophane.

loans.name: Glaiza

texts.en:
For almost two years now, Glaiza has been engaged in the buying and selling of lumber. Aside from that, she has also sold charcoal for supplemental income.

She is a 29-year-old woman with three children residing in the town of Talibon, Bohol. Her eldest child is 8, while the youngest is 3.

She decided to take the loan to support her current source of living. Glaiza has requested a loan in the amount of 4,000 PHP to buy additional supplies like charcoal and a variety of lumber. These will increase her purchasing power and allow her to continue to manage her day-to-day livelihood activity. With this, she could mange her finances and continue providing her family with healthy diets.

In the future, she is hoping that both her sources of income will become sustainable.

loans.use: to buy additional supplies like charcoal and a variety of lumber.

loans.name: Arnilyn

texts.en:
Arnilyn works hard to support her family. Arnilyn is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Arnilyn requested a PHP 27,000 loan through NWTF to buy an additional fishing net and gasoline.

Arnilyn has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Arnilyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy an additional fishing net and gasoline.

loans.name: Luningning

texts.en:
Luningning is 41 years old, married with three children, who are in school.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of household goods to sell.

Luningning has borrowed and paid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for one year and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of household goods to sell.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is married with children. He operates a retail shop in Kasese, Uganda. Through this he is able to look after his family without interfering with his business capital.

His greatest desire is to have a wholesale shop, and he is working hard toward it.

Charles wants to include foodstuffs in his shop, but is limited by inadequate capital. He requests money to add foodstuffs like cassava, potatoes and bananas for selling and improving his income levels.

loans.use: to add foodstuffs like cassava, potatoes and bananas for selling.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Afi est une veuve femme  âgée de 54 ans qui vit à Tokoin. Ayant un enfant à charge, Afi  s’efforce  pour gagner son revenu  en revendant des produits alimentaire.  Pour s’approvisionner, Afi se rend quatre fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des bols de farine de manioc et des  bidons d’huile rouge, Afi nécessite ce prêt pour financer son approvisionnement. Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Afi va pouvoir améliorer son activité et aider son enfant dans son éducation scolaire puis améliorer ses conditions de vie quotidiennes.
texts.en:
Afi is a 54-year old widowed woman living in Tokoin. With one child to take care of, Afi is trying to earn her income by selling food products.

To get her supplies, Afi goes to the market four times per month. So that she can order bowls of cassava flour and barrels of red oil, Afi needs this loan to finance her purchases.

With the resulting profit margin, Afi will be able to improve her activity and help her child with school education, then improve her daily living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seven bowls of cassava flour and nine barrels of red oil.

loans.name: Deo

texts.en:
Deo is a married male, aged 42, with three children of 15, 14, and 12 years. He deals in produce and also earns from farming as an additional source of income. His business is located in the rural area where there is high demand for his products. He began his business with an intention of sustaining the family.

He wants to get a loan to purchase more stock of maize to sell in order to maximize his income. His main customers are buyers from Kagadi, and his dream is educating the children.

He has faced challenges of price fluctuations but is still a hardworking man.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of maize to sell in order to maximize income.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is a married man with children. He deals in a coffee business and also earns a monthly salary. He is able to cater for his family needs through these sources of income.

Simon wants to stock more coffee because of the fact that it's now peak season, but he lacks enough money to do so. He requests more money to buy coffee for selling, so that his income levels can improve, and the same time, he'll be able to pay back the loan.

loans.use: to buy coffee for selling

loans.name: Ramziya

texts.ru:
Рамзия родилась в семье рабочих в городе Душанбе. Незамужем, живёт в городе Душанбе, по национальности таджичка. По характеру она очень доброжелательная, честная, активная и работоспособная  девушка. Она работает бухгалтером в  частной в фирме.  
 Рамзия  обратилась в МДО «Арванд» чтобы получить кредит, для того чтобы оплатит договор учёбы брата. Она заранее благодар МДО Авранд за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Ramziya was born to a working-class family in Dushanbe. She is not married, lives in the city of Dushanbe, and is a Tajik national. She is a very friendly, fair, energetic, and capable woman by character. She works as an accountant in a private firm. 

Ramziya applied for a loan with MDO Arvand to pay for her brother's tuition. She is grateful in advance to MDO Arvand for their support and trust.

loans.use: to pay for her brother's education

loans.name: Tamer

texts.en:
Tamer is a 26-year-old, married man from Jabalia city, which is located in the Gaza Strip, next to the refugee camp with the same name. He works as an employee in the public sector, where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family needs, but he wants to make his family more comfortable and improve their standard of living.

So, Tamer took a USD loan from FATEN, which will enable him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, Tamer will be able to decrease the electricity expenses, while using a cleaner form of energy (rather than gas). Tamer’s family will have an easier time heating water for showers, cooking, and also washing clothes and dishes.

Tamer appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more sodas and beer for selling.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: LA SEÑORA TIENE 53 AÑOS, POR SU EDAD PRESENTA PROBLEMAS DENTALES Y  PERDIDAS DE PIEZAS DESEA ATENDERSE PARA PODER RECUPERAR SU MORDIDA ORIGINAL Y SU SONRISA, LA FALTA DE PIEZAS LE DIFICULTA ALIMENTARSE ADECUADAMENTE ADEMAS DEL PROBLEMA ESTÉTICO QUE SUFRE.
texts.en: This lady is 53 years old.  Due to her age, she has dental problems and has lost teeth.  She wishes to tend to this in order to recover her original bite and her smile.  The lack of teeth makes it difficult for her to eat adequately in addition to the aesthetic problem she suffers from.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
Cecilia, de 32 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado, no continuo porque decidió trabajar, está acompañada y su pareja es albañil, tienen 3 hijos y están estudiando.

Cecilia, desde hace 2 años tiene una granja de pollos, este negocio lo coloco con el objetivo de ayudar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar, anteriormente solo era ama de casa, pero ahora aparte de su granja también trabaja con su mamá en una venta de tortillas, su día comienza a las 5:00 a.m. para preparar el desayuno para su familia y luego atiende su granja, porque a las 9:30 a.m. se dirige al negocio de las tortillas que se encuentra a unos kilómetros de su casa. 

El crédito será invertido para comprar más pollos y concentrado para alimentarlos.

Cecilia, sueña con ver a sus hijos graduarse de una carrera universitaria y también sueña con una granja de gallinas ponedoras.
texts.en:
Cecilia, who is 32 years old, has a fourth grade education. She quit school because she decided to work. She lives with her partner who works in construction. They have 3 three children in school.

Cecilia has had a chicken farm for two years. She started this business to help her partner with the household expenses. Before she was only a housewife but now, in addition to the chicken farm, she also works with her mother at a tortilla store. Her day begins at 5:00 a.m. to make her family's breakfast and then take care of the chickens because at 9:30 a.m. she goes to the tortilla store a few kilometers from her house.

The loan will be used to buy more chickens and concentrate to feed them. Cecilia dreams of seeing her children get a university degree and she also dreams of having a farm with laying hens.

loans.use: to buy more chickens and concentrate to feed them.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: EL SEÑOR ES UNA PERSONA DE LA TERCERA EDAD ES PENSIONADO, PADECE UNA ENFERMEDAD CRÓNICA QUE LE HA PROVOCADO PROBLEMAS EN SU DENTADURA SUFRE DE UNA SEVERA INFECCIÓN EN LAS ENCÍAS LO QUE LE HA PROVOCADO DESPRENDIMIENTO EN SUS PIEZAS DENTALES  LO QUE LE IMPIDE ALIMENTARSE ADECUADAMENTE. LAMENTABLEMENTE SUS RECURSOS NO LE ALCANZAN PARA EL TRATAMIENTO.
texts.en: This man is elderly, and he is retired.  He has a chronic illness that has caused dental problems.  He has a severe infection in his gums, which has caused dental dehiscence [a loss of the buccal lingual bone overlaying the root portion of a tooth].  This impedes his eating adequately.  Sadly, he does not have enough resources for the treatment.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Qudrat

texts.ru:
Кудрат родился в семье рабочих. Он женат и  имеет 2 детей. Они живет в сельской местности. Кудрат занимается куплей  продажей овощей и фруктов. Он покупает на рынке района овощи и фрукты по оптовой цене и продаёт  их в розницу. Так он зарабатывает на жизнь.
 Кудрат хочет расширить свой бизнес. Но у него не хватает собственных средств. Он обратился в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Он заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Qudrat was born to a family of workers. He is married and has two children. He lives in a rural area and works buying and selling fruits and vegetables. He buys them wholesale at the local market and resells them at retail. In such a way he earns a living. He wants to expand his business but doesn't have enough money. He has approached Arvand for a loan. He is thankful in advance for the support and trust.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables for resale

loans.name: Dédé

texts.fr: Mère d’un enfant, Dédé est une femme mariée âgée de 28 ans résidant à Tokoin. Dédé est une coiffeuse qui s’approvisionne des mèches cinq fois par mois au marché et les revendent dans son salon de coiffure. Dédé nécessite ce crédit pour commander des douzaines de mèches et des boîtes de gel en vue de gagner des bénéfices afin d’appuyer son mari dans la prise en charge de leur enfant et les besoins en nourriture et santé de la famille.
texts.en: The mother of one child, Dédé is married, 28 years old, and living in Tokoin. She is a hairdresser and gets her supplies of hair extensions five times a month at the market. She resells in her hair salon. Dédé needs this loan to order dozens of hair extensions and containers of gel with the aim of earning profits for supporting her husband to cover their child’s expenses, as well as the family’s healthcare and food.

loans.use: to purchase 2 dozen hair extensions and 5 cans of gel

loans.name: Sufian

texts.en:
Sufian is a 26-year-old, married man from Jabalia city, which is located in the Gaza Strip, next to the refugee camp with the same name. He works as an employee in the public sector, where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family needs, but he wants to make his family more comfortable and improve their standard of living.

So, Sufian took a USD loan from FATEN, which will enable him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, Sufian will be able to decrease the electricity expenses, while using a cleaner form of energy (rather than gas). Sufian’s family will have an easier time heating water for showers, cooking, and also washing clothes and dishes.

Sufian appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Talal

texts.en: Talal is a 56-year-old, married man from Rafah City, which is located in the Gaza Strip next to the refugee camp with the same name. He works as an employee in the public sector, where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family needs, but he wants to make his family more comfortable and improve their standard of living. Talal took a loan from FATEN to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, Talal will be able to decrease the electricity expenses while using a cleaner form of energy (rather than gas). Talal’s family will have an easier time heating water for showers, cooking, and washing clothes and dishes.  Talal appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house

loans.name: Ahmad

This income barely covers all the family needs, but he wants to make his family more comfortable and improve their standard of living. Ahmad took a loan from FATEN to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to decrease the electricity expenses while using a cleaner form of energy (rather than gas). Ahmad’s family will have an easier time heating water for showers, cooking, and washing clothes and dishes. Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 43-year-old, married man from Rafah City, which is located in the Gaza Strip, next to the refugee camp with the same name. He works as an employee in the public sector, where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family needs, but he wants to make his family more comfortable and improve their standard of living. Ahmad took a loan from FATEN to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to decrease the electricity expenses while using a cleaner form of energy (rather than gas). Ahmad’s family will have an easier time heating water for showers, cooking, and washing clothes and dishes. Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Dúo Devora De San Pedro Group

texts.es: Dúo Devora de San Pedro La señora Débora Maritza tiene tres hijos, es casada y vive en una de las calles principales de su cantón.  Ella tiene una tortillería desde hace dos años y tiene una empleada.  Su sueño es seguir creciendo en el negocio y así también dar más empleos a varias mujeres que necesitan una oportunidad para sacar adelante a sus hijos.  Ella necesita comprar varios quintales de maíz que le hacen falta en el negocio, y cada uno le cuesta Q. 160.00.  Le han ofrecido una buena oferta y no la quiere desaprovechar por tal motivo ella hace otro préstamo y así comprar el maíz que le están ofreciendo a buen precio para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Dúo Devora of San Pedro [Devora Duo Group]

Mrs. Deborah Maritza has three children, is married and lives on one of the main streets of the canton. She has had a tortilla shop for two years and has one employee. Her dream is to grow the business and thus also give more jobs to several women who need an opportunity to raise their children.

She needs to buy several quintals [46 kg (about 100 lbs)] of corn that are needed in the business, and each costs Q 160.00 [approx. $21]. She has been offered a good deal and does not want to miss out on it. For that reason she is applying for another loan to buy the corn that she is being offered at a good price, in order to have better profits.

loans.use: buy corn to make tortillas to sell.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 26-year-old, married man from Rafah city, which is located in the Gaza Strip, next to the refugee camp with the same name. He works as an employee in the public sector, where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family needs, but he wants to make his family more comfortable and improve their standard of living.

So, Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN, which will enable him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, Mohammad will be able to decrease the electricity expenses, while using a cleaner form of energy (rather than gas). Mohammad’s family will have an easier time heating water for showers, cooking, and also washing clothes and dishes.

Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Kossi Mawuli

texts.fr: Marié et père d’un enfant, Kossi est un homme âgé de 34 ans qui vit à Tokoin. Kossi est un tailleur qui confectionne des habits dans son propre atelier de couture à son domicile et les revendent au marché. Pour s’approvisionner du nécessaire pour la confection, Kossi se rend une fois par mois au marché. Kossi demande ce prêt pour commander des mètres tissus en vue de gagner un gain et pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille puis inscrire son enfant dans une bonne école.
texts.en: The married father of one child, Kossi is 34 years old and lives in Tokoin. He is a tailor who makes clothing in his own workshop at home, and he resells his products at the market. To stock up on necessities for his production, he goes once a month to the market. Kossi is asking for this loan to order meters of fabrics with the aim of earning a profit and being able to meet the needs of his family. He will then enroll his child in a good school.

loans.use: to purchase 20 meters of fabrics

loans.name: María Andrea

texts.es:
María tiene 40 años de edad, vive junto a su cónyuge y un hijo en la comunidad de Oyotún, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

María se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, como patos, gallos, gallinas, pollos, desde hace 10 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de los mismos y para la compra de una mayor cantidad de pollos, patos y gallinas, de esta manera ella espera ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad de animales, con esto María Andrea espera incrementar el stock de su negocio lo que le va a permitir aumentar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María is 40 years old and lives with her spouse and one child in the Oyotún community, whose population makes a living through agriculture, commerce and animal-raising.  It is located in the Chiclayo province, which belongs to the Lambayeque region in the north coast of Peru.  

María has dedicated herself to the raising and selling of animals such as ducks, roosters, hens and chickens for the past 10 years.  Her business is located in her house.  She has requested a loan to buy balanced nutrition to fatten her animals and to buy more chickens, ducks and hens, which allows her to offer a better variety of animals to her clients.  With this loan, María Andrea hopes to increase the stock in her business and increase her income levels, which will improve the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of chickens, ducks, and  hens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to study for a certificate in oral rehabilitation and contemporary dentistry.

loans.name: Djatsui

texts.fr: Veuve et mère de cinq enfants, Djatsui est une femme âgée de 55 ans résidant à Tokoin. Djatsui est une marchande de produits d’alimentaires qui achète ses marchandises quatre fois par mois au marché et les revendent à la devanture de son domicile. Djatsui sollicite ce prêt pour commander des paniers de tomates fraîches et des sacs de piments en vue de stocker une plus grande quantité de marchandises et de maximiser son profit afin d’aider ses enfants dans leur éducation et de subvenir à certaines charges quotidiennes éprouvées.
texts.en: A widow and the mother of five children, Djatsui is 55  years old and living in Tokoin. She sells grocery items and makes her purchases five times a month at the market. She resells in front of her home. Djatsui is requesting this loan to order baskets of fresh tomatoes and bags of chili peppers with the aim of stocking a large quantity of merchandise and maximizing her profit. She could then help her children with their education and cover certain proven day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to purchase 3 baskets of fresh tomatoes and 4 bags of chili peppers

loans.name: Akouelevi

texts.fr: Revendeuse  de fruits et de la liquidation, Akouelevi habite à Tokoin avec sa famille ; elle est mariée et mère de quatre enfants. Akouelevi est âgée de 52 ans et s’approvisionne de ses marchandises six fois par mois au marché et les revendent à la devanture de son domicile. Akouelevi sollicite ce crédit pour commander des paniers de bananes et des bassines d’oranges afin de pouvoir réaliser ce rêve, celui d’avoir une grande marge bénéficiaire et participer aux charges du foyer pour mieux vivre telle qu’elle espère voir naître.
texts.en: A seller of fruits and clearance items, Akouelevi lives in Tokoin with her family. Aged 52, she is a married mother of four and purchases her supplies of merchandise six times a month at the market. She resells in front of her home. Akouelevi is requesting this loan to order baskets of bananas and tubs of oranges in order to realize her dream, which is to have a bigger profit margin and to help cover household expenses, so as to have a better life in a way she hopes to create.

loans.use: to purchase 2 baskets of bananas and 2 tubs of oranges

loans.name: Dédé

texts.fr: Agée de 38 ans, Dédé est une femme célibataire et mère de trois enfants vivant ensemble à Tokoin. Pour parvenir à ses fins, Dédé vend des mèches et des défrisants dans son salon de coiffure en s’approvisionnant deux fois par mois au marché. Dédé réalise sa rentabilité dans son activité et pour bien satisfaire aux besoins de ses clients, Dédé  désire ce prêt pour commander des douzaines de mèches afin d’agrandir son stock et aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire et à couvrir les besoins quotidiens de la famille.
texts.en: Dédé, aged 38, is an unmarried woman and the mother of three, living together in Tokoin. To reach her goals, she sells hair extensions and straightener in her hair salon. She gets her supplies twice a month at the market. Dédé is realizing a profit from her business. And to do well in meeting the needs of her customers, she would like this loan to order dozens of hair extensions, so as to expand her stock and help out her children with their education, as well as to cover the family’s day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to purchase 9 dozen hair extensions

loans.name: Shadi

texts.en:
Shadi is a 36-year-old married man from Jabalia city, which is located in the Gaza Strip, next to the refugee camp with the same name. He works as an employee in the public sector, where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family needs, but he wants to make his family more comfortable and improve their standard of living.

So Shadi took a USD loan from FATEN, which will enable him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

By taking this loan, Shadi will be able to decrease the electricity expenses, while using a cleaner form of energy (rather than gas). Shadi’s family will have an easier time heating water for showers, cooking and also washing clothes and dishes. Shadi appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
José tiene 38 años de edad, es conviviente; vive con su familia en el caserio Yapana, José realiza las labores de destilación de aguardiente, ya que él cuenta con extensiones de caña. Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de Callacyuc, provincia y región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

José está dedicado a la destilación de aguardiente, hace más de 10 años, solicita el presente crédito para realizar inversión en la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de aguardiente, así como reparación de equipos de destilación lo que le asegurá un gran producción, y le generará mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende una mejor calidad de vida para él y toda su familia.
texts.en:
José is 38 years old and lives with his family in the small village of Yapana.  José works distilling liquor, as he has sugarcane fields.  HIs community is located in the Callacyuc district, in the region and province of Catamarca, in the northern mountains of Peru.  


José has made a living through the distillation of liquor for more than 10 years.  He requests this loan to make the investment in purchasing raw materials for the process of producing the liquor, such as repairing the machines that mil assure good production.  This will generate more income, more earnings, and provide a better quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: buy the raw materials for producing liquor, such as repairing the distillery equipment.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio Cesar tiene 57 años de edad, es casado, sin hijos, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Julio Cesar se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que está ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, Julio Cesar solicita préstamo para mejoramiento de infraestructura donde se encuentran sus animales, dicha inversión le servirá para criar en mejores condiciones a sus animales, con gran influencia en el negocio; Julio Cesar piensa mejorar productividad de los animales para poder atender las diversas necesidades y gustos de los clientes de la zona. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar is 57, married without children, and lives with his family in the rural area of the Oyotún district, in the Chiclayo provide and the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.  HIs community makes a living through agriculture, animal-raising, and commerce.  

Julio Cesar makes a living raising and selling animals.  He has more than 10 years of experience in his business, which is located in the back part of his home. Julio Cesar requests a loan to improve the infrastructure where his animals are kept.  This investment will serve to raise his animals in better conditions, which has a great influence on his business.  Julio Cesar wants to improve the productivity of his animals to be able to meet the diverse needs and wishes of his customers in the area.   In the short term, it will allow him to increase his income and earnings and provide a better quart of life for his family.

loans.use: to improve the infrastructure where his animals are held.

loans.name: Wilmae

texts.en:
Wilmae is 32 years old; she is married with three children. Two of her children are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Wilmae has a business selling beauty products in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 22,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more items like perfume, body lotion and other beauty products to sell.

Wilmae has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more items like perfume, body lotion and other beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 57 years old; she married with seven children. She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines.

Elizabeth requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Elizabeth has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Elizabeth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Jennelyn

texts.en:
Jennelyn is 49 years old; she is married with one child.

Jennelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, shampoo, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, juice and other personal care products.

Jennelyn has borrowed and paid nine loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from buy-and-sell charcoal.

Jennelyn aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, shampoo, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, juice and other personal care products.

loans.name: Janeza

texts.en:
Janeza is 31 years old; she is married with one child who is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Janeza has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Janeza has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, soft drinks, sugar and other personal care products.

In the future Janeza would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Dovi Adjokoé

texts.fr: Mère de quatre enfants, Dovi est une femme mariée qui vit à Tokoin. Agée de 53 ans, Dovi est une revendeuse des articles de mercerie et des mèches. Dovi s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et demande ce crédit pour commander des douzaines de mèches, des cartons de fil et des doublures en vue de gagner plus de recettes et pouvoir faire face aux charges de la famille et préparer la scolarité de ses enfants pour la rentrée prochaine.
texts.en:
Dovi is a married woman and the mother of four living in Tokoin. She is 53 years old. Dovi works as a vendor selling sewing supplies and hair extensions. She stocks up twice a month at the market.  

Dovi  is applying for a loan in order to stock up dozens of hair extensions  as well as boxes of thread and lining in order to increase her sales volume, meet family expenses and prepare for her children’s return to school at the beginning of a new school year.

loans.use: to buy nine dozens of hair extensions, eight boxes of sewing thread and eight boxes of lining.

loans.name: Dúo Samaria Group

texts.es:
DUO SAMARIA 
Este dúo está formado por doña Eva Madahi, de 30 años de edad,  es casada y tiene 4 hijos, nos cuenta que desde hace 7 años se dedica a la venta de artículos de consumo diario como : golosinas, azúcar, arroz, aguas, y embutidos, ahora quiere ampliar su negocio y por ello solicita la ayuda de fape para comprar algunos productos que no tiene, ya que su tienda está enfrente de un campo de futbol, ahora quiere vender granizadas y frutas congeladas ya que los fines de semana se hacen campeonatos y le piden ese tipo de productos, además quiere comenzar a vender carnes, el sueño de ella es poder tener otro local para obtener más ganancias.
texts.en:
Samaria Duo:  This duo is comprised in part of Eva Madahi, who is 30 years old and married with 4 children.  She told us that 7 years ago she dedicate herself to selling daily consumable goods such as snacks, sugar, rice, water, and lunch meats.  

She now wants to expand her business, so she sought the help of FAPE, to buy some products she doesn't currently have.  As her store is in front of a soccer field, she wants to sell snow cones and frozen fruits, because there are tournaments on the weekends and people ask for these types of products.  She also wants to begin selling meats.  Her dream is to have another location of obtain more income.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell.

loans.name: Inoyat

texts.ru: Иноят 51 лет, она проживает в районе под названием Шахринав. У Иноят четверых детей. Иноят в течение 15 лет занимается шитьем женской одежды в национальном стиле. Она также на некоторых платьях сама делает вышивки. В месяц она может сшить даже 25 платья. Иноят прекрасно справляется со своей работой и количество клиентов постепенно возрастают. Сейчас ее швейная машинка устарела, и она в месяц шьет 10 платья. Иноят обратилась за кредитом, потому что ей необходимо поменять швейную машинку, потому она уже не рабочем состояние, и прослужила очень долгое время. Новая швейная машинка стоит дорого, чтобы ее купить Иноят потребуется еще не большое количество денег. Она надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Inoyat is 51 years old and lives in the Sharinav region. She has four children. For 15 years, Inoyat has been sewing traditional women’s clothing. She also embroiders dresses. She can sew up to 25 dresses per month. Inoyat manages her work very well, and has a growing customer base. At present her sewing machine has become obsolete, and Inoyat sews only 10 dresses per month. 

She has applied for a loan to upgrade her sewing machine which is no longer in good working condition after many years of use. A new sewing machine is expensive, and Inoyat is still lacking some funds for it. She is hoping for your support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Grupo Solidario Trabajando Con Alegría Group

texts.es:
Grupo Solidario Trabajando Con Alegría Doña Margarita es originaria de la aldea Pacorral, del municipio de Tecpan Guatemala, ella tiene 43 años de edad  bajo su responsabilidad están sus 5 hijos menores de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano y a la agricultura.
El crédito que ella recibió lo invirtió en compra de  materia prima  para sus tejidos ya que a veces por falta de capital no puede hacer los pedidos que le hacen,  también compro semillas, fertilizantes y fungicidas para su trabajo en la agricultura, ella también se dedica a la siembra de maíz, frijol, fresas, arveja y tomate.
Ella sueña con ampliar más su negocio, ofrecer mas variedad de tejidos a sus clientes así obtendrá mejores ganancias y mandar a sus hijos a la escuela para un futuro mejor y también mejorar su casa donde vive, esta solicitando este crédito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de tejidos tipicos para vender.
texts.en:
Trabajando Con Alegría [Working with Joy] Solidarity Group: Margarita is from the village of Pacorral in the Tecpán municipality of Guatemala.  She is 43 years old, with five dependent children who are under her care.  She works making traditional textiles by hand, and also farming.

She invested the loan that she received in buying supplies for her weavings because at times she can’t meet the orders people have given her, due to a lack of capital.  She also bought seeds, fertilizers, and fungicides for her farming work.  She also works sowing corn, beans, strawberries, peas, and tomatoes.

She dreams of expanding her business and offering a greater variety of woven textiles to her customers so that she can earn more and send her children to school.  This would give them a a better future.  She also wants to improve the house where she lives.  She is asking for this loan to buy supplies for making traditional textiles, in order to sell them.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making traditional woven textiles to sell

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is a 26-year-old married woman with two children, both of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Catherine has been operating a fishing business in the Philippines for seven years. She has requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to buy fish nets, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

Catherine would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish nets, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Teofreda

texts.en:
Teofreda is a 34-year-old married woman with one child who attends school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Teofreda has been operating a fishing business in the Philippines for 10 years. She has requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to buy fish nets, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

Teofreda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish nets, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia, a 58-year-old married mother of three, has been raising pigs in the Philippines for 20 years. She has requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Cecilia has borrowed 25 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her enterprise. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Rolena

texts.en:
Rolena works hard to support herself. She is single and has had a business selling gasoline in the Philippines for three years.

Rolena has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional gallons of gasoline to resell. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional gallons of gasoline to resell.

loans.name: Vicky

texts.en:
Vicky is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 22,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is re-listing Vicky's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr: Amélé est une femme mariée qui vit à Tokoin avec ses quatre enfants à charge. Agée de 37 ans, Amélé est une marchande dynamique et courageuse  qui vend des collants à domicile et en parcourant les quartiers environnant afin de disposer d’une bonne capacité financière. Amélé s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché et sollicite ce prêt pour commander des douzaines de collants afin de financer son commerce et trouver un bon rendement pour subvenir à ses besoins quotidiens et aider son mari dans les charges de la famille.
texts.en:
Amélé is thirty-seven years old, married and responsible for four children. She lives in Tokoin and is a dynamic and courageous saleswoman. She sells tights from her home and on foot in surrounding neighbourhoods and her business is very successful. Once a month she buys new supplies from the market.

Amélé has requested this loan to buy dozens more pairs of tights. Her improved earnings will provide for her day-to-day costs and help her husband support their family.

loans.use: to buy 9 dozen pairs of tights.

loans.name: Ayawovi

texts.fr: Mère de quatre enfants, Ayawovi est une femme célibataire âgée de 43 ans. Ayawovi réside à Tokoin et est une marchande de produits alimentaire. Ayawovi achète ses marchandises trois fois par mois au marché et les revendent dans sa propre  boutique à domicile. Ayawovi sollicite ce crédit pour commander des cartons biscuits salés, de biscuits sucrés et des macaronis. Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Ayawovi va pouvoir aider ses enfants dans leur l’éducation scolaire et aux charges quotidiennes éprouvées.
texts.en:
The mother of four children, Ayawovi is a single woman aged 43. She lives in Tokoin and sells groceries. She buys her merchandise three times a month in the market and sells it in her own store in her home.

Ayawovi is requesting this loan to order some cartons of salty biscuits (crackers), of sweet biscuits (cookies) and of macaroni. With the profit she will make from the loan, Ayawovi will be able to help her children with their education and cover day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to buy nine cartons of crackers, nine cartons of sweet biscuits (cookies), and 11 cartons of macaroni.

loans.name: Hodalo

texts.fr: Célibataire et sans enfant, Hodalo est une femme âgée de 29 ans résidant à Tokoin. Hodalo est une marchande  de produits d’alimentations générales qui s’approvisionne de ses marchandises deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile. Hodalo demande ce prêt pour commander des cartons de sardines et de tomates en vue d’avoir un stock important et maximiser son profit afin de relancer son activité et pouvoir subvenir aux charges quotidiennes qu’elle éprouve.
texts.en:
Hodalo, age 29, is a single woman without children who lives in Tokoin. She sells general food items, and she buys her stock twice a month at the market. She conducts her sales in front of her home.

Hodalo is seeking this loan to order cartons of sardines and tomatoes to have a substantial supply of merchandise and maximize her profit margin. This will help to bolster her activity and to provide for her day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to buy 5 cartons of sardines and 3 cartons of tomatoes.

loans.name: Sreyratt

texts.en:
Sreyratt is a 21-year-old single student who is pursuing a bachelor’s degree, majoring in Engineering in her third year at a university in the city. She is from the Prey Veng Province in Cambodia. Her parents are rice farmers. 

Now Sreyratt is lacking the money to cover her university fees from the third to the fifth year, so she has decided to take out a loan. With this loan, she will have enough money to earn a bachelor’s degree and graduate successfully. After graduation, she is going to find a good job with a decent salary, so she will be able to save money to build her own house.

loans.use: to cover her university fees from the third to the fifth year

loans.name: Aku

texts.fr: Aku est une femme mariée qui vit à Tokoin avec ses quatre enfants à charge. Agée de 51 ans, Aku est une femme dynamique qui fabrique et vend des amuse-gueules et gâteaux à domicile afin de disposer d’une bonne capacité financière. Pour bien atteindre ses objectifs, Aku s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et désire ce prêt pour commander des sacs de farine de blé, des bidons d’huile et le sac de sucre afin de financer son commerce et trouver un bon rendement pour subvenir à ses besoins quotidiens et celui de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Aku is fifty-one years old, married and responsible for four children. She lives in Tokoin and is a dynamic woman who makes and sells snacks and cakes. She sells her food from her home and her business is very successful. Twice a month she buys new supplies from the market.

Aku has requested this loan to buy sacks of wheatflour and sugar, and drums of oil. Her improved earnings will provide for her day-to-day costs and those of her children.

loans.use: to buy 3 sacks of wheatflour, 2 drums of oil and 1 sack of sugar.

loans.name: Kékéli

texts.fr: Kékéli est une femme célibataire avec un enfant à charge habitant à Tokoin. Kékéli est une revendeuse de friperies qui s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché et le revend dans les quartiers environnant. Pour avoir un stock important et maximiser son profit, Kékéli sollicite ce prêt pour commander des unités de jupes, de robes et de corsages en vue de répondre à nombreuse attentes de ses clients afin de gagner des bénéfices et aider son enfant dans son éducation scolaire.
texts.en:
Kékéli is a single woman who is responsible for one child. She lives in Tokoin and sells second-hand clothing. Once a month she buys new supplies from the market and sells them in the surrounding neighbourhoods.

Kékéli has requested this loan to build up her stock levels and maximise her profits. She will buy skirts, dresses and bodices to meet the demands of her many customers. Her improved earnings will provide for the education of her child.

loans.use: to buy 47 skirts, 47 dresses and 48 bodices.

loans.name: Dina

texts.en: Dressmaking and tailoring has been Dina's business for seven months. She also offers assorted products from Baguio. Dina is married with five children.who attend school. Her generated income goes toward the family's daily needs, rental of her stall and allowances for her five children. Dina is in need of additional capital to increase her income. For this reason, she is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase eight rolls of garments and thread for her dressmaking and tailoring business. This loan will enable her to provide quality service to all her customers and generate better income.

loans.use: to purchase eight rolls of garments and thread for her dressmaking and tailoring business.

loans.name: Dilnozai

texts.ru:
Дилноза молодая  девушка  19 лет. Она не замужем и  живет вместе с родителями. Их семья занимается животноводством и земледелием. Она очень трудолюбивая и жизнерадостная девушка. В этом году она поступила в университет, но она должна оплатить договор обучения. У неё не хватает собственных средств. 
Дилноза узнала о новом продукте "Тахсил" и обратилась в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Она заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Dilnozai is a young 19-year-old lady. She is unmarried and lives with her parents. Her family rears animals and grows crops. She is a very hard-working and cheerful young lady. This year she has been admitted to university, but she must pay for her tuition contract. She does not have enough of her own funds. Dilnozai learned of the new "Takhsil" [loan] product and has applied to MDO Arvand for a loan. She thanks MDO Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to pay for her university tuition.

loans.name: Ma. Dolores
